comments.text: Boy, how many 3D prints I wished I had this while working on them!

replies.text: Hi Fredrick, totally get that. It really makes finishing 3D prints so much easier. Can’t wait for you to try it on your next print!

comments.text: Tricky would be sanding brittle 3d printing resin, it's very hard to sand, but other power tools (even smaller ones) can break off pieces or do "too much" work in terms of sanding or cutting.

replies.text: Hi Jemima, you’re totally right—brittle resin is tricky to sand, and most power tools just remove too much material or risk chipping those delicate areas.

comments.text: The trickiest sanding challenge I've faced is the awkward, tight angles in 3D prints - particularly connector holes, especially when a support interfact doesn't want to disconnect. Ones where you could *maybe* get a sanding stick into, but will get almost nowhere because the piece you need to sand is allllllll the way back into the corner.

replies.text: Hi Alexandra, those tight corners and connector holes can be really frustrating to get into with traditional tools.

comments.text: What is the abrasive used in the sandpaper? Aluminium oxide, silicone carbide, etc.. ?

replies.text: Hi Richard, great question! We use silicon carbide abrasives across all our sandpapers.
Great answer!!
Yes—silicon carbide is much harder than aluminum (around Mohs 9), so from an abrasive standpoint it can definitely handle removing small CNC tabs on aluminum parts.

comments.text: I really can not wait for this, I have already brought 2 ppl over through the affilated program hoping to get even more of my friends to join. Is the pencil promotion still ongoing?

replies.text: Hi Tiberia, thank you so much—we really appreciate the support and for spreading the word!

comments.text: Smaller details and recessed niches can be tricky to sand, hopefully the adjustable reciprocating action and multiple heads help make working with these easier.

replies.text: Hi Steven, totally—that’s exactly what we were aiming for. Small details and recessed areas can be a pain, and that’s where the reciprocating motion and multiple heads really help. Can’t wait to see what you end up using it on!

comments.text: Do you plan on doing any stretch goals?

replies.text: Hi Christop, at this point, it’s a bit late for us to introduce stretch goals. That said, we do have a big surprise planned that we’ll be sharing with all backers as the project gets close to ending—or shortly after it wraps up. So stay tuned for the project updates 😉
Isn't it more than a month to go? there is still so much steam to get by providing enticement for ppl to join especially streech goals. ^^

comments.text: This little device looks like what I’ve been looking for. I love almost everything about it.

replies.text: Hi Sheldon, thanks for the kind words—we’re really glad NeoSander feels like what you’ve been looking for.

comments.text: Does the sandingpro come with a head for the foam sandpaper?

replies.text: Hi Michelle, the Sanding Pro combo includes one set of multicolor sanding heads. If you’re looking to get more sanding heads, there’s no need to add another NeoSander pledge. You can simply select the Basic Sanding Head Collection in the add-on section, which is the easiest way to expand your setup.

comments.text: Trickiest sanding challenges would have to be every D&D miniature I have printed for friends with my FDM printers.  The Feature I love ethe most is the use of a linear drive motor.

I backed the all-in combo and had a question about the multi-color sanding heads. Is there a case that they fit into for storage? Because having 8 free-standing blocks with no way to effectively store them is a bit cumbersome for organizational purposes.

replies.text: I am interested in a case like this too. I am too clumsy to have it just sitting there open when not in use. Also just keeping it in the packaging is tacky
Since you guys have all the dimensions. Can you provide a free stl of a storage box that we can print ourselves?

@Christina, we actually encourage users to do their own creations and modifications around NeoSander, and a 3D-printed storage solution is a great idea. I’ll definitely pass your suggestion about providing a free STL file to our team for consideration.

comments.text: As a bit of feedback, it would be useful to have corded operation as an option. Far too many times I've picked up a tool to use it, only to find out the battery was dead, because it hadn't been sitting on its charger.

replies.text: Their tools (including this new one) work when plugged in and battery is dead
Great, that's good to know. The front page made it sound like it charged from a dock only. Thanks for the reply.

Hi Maeyanie, thanks for the feedback—totally hear you on that. Just to clarify: NeoSander does support plug-in operation. You can use it while it’s plugged in and charging—no need to wait for it to charge or rely on a dock only.

comments.text: Trickiest : Getting a precise fit of laser cut components in my models.

Hello there, I just pledged the all in combo. Looks all great for the 3D stuff I made with Bambu. The pledge includes the NeoBlade. Will that arrive sooner, because it’s already on the market and I’m very inpatient 🥹? Great work ladies and guys!

replies.text: Hi Peter, thanks so much for backing the All-in Combo—and we’re excited to hear you’ll be using it on your 3D prints!
Oké, thanks… an other question. Will there be an add on for de calliper and/or ruler?

Do you mean NeoRuler? If so, we’re considering making it available as an add-on in the shipping survey we’ll send out after the campaign wraps up (via PledgeBox). You’ll be able to add it to your pledge there when you fill in your shipping info.

comments.text: I backed this project. Awesome looking tool for stuborn 3d print lines. Will get heavy use in my modelling as I build studio scale models.

replies.text: Hi Des Chin, thanks so much for backing the project! And just to clarify, we’re HOZO. Yes—once the campaign wraps up, all accessories will be available for purchase on the HOZO website, as well as other official sales channels. This Kickstarter campaign simply offers the best pricing ever as a backer benefit.
Awesome !!! looking forward to it.

comments.text: Can I cut my own sandpaper replacements or am I stuck only buying refills from your company?

replies.text: Hi Sachi, we generally don’t recommend cutting your own sandpaper, mainly because the adhesive can be tricky—if it’s too strong, it may leave residue on the sanding head, which can affect how flat the next piece sits. Our sandpaper adhesive has been carefully tuned to strike the right balance: a secure hold with clean removal.

comments.text: With this tool about to be available: Do you have plans for a desktop dedusting plant with filters to minimize the resin dust pollution and such while working with NeoSander?

replies.text: Hi Oli, as you can probably tell from the GIFs, NeoSander’s reciprocating motion produces far less airborne dust compared to traditional rotary sanding. That said, we definitely don’t rule out exploring tools in other areas down the line. I’ll be sure to pass your idea along to our team for future consideration.

comments.text: Can you make a knife blade kit for it, or perhaps  a cutting edge will not work. You tell me.

replies.text: Hi Russ, thanks for taking the time to share such detailed thoughts — we really appreciate it.

comments.text: Hello. I backed your project. A few impressions about the package:

replies.text: Hi there, thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts — we really appreciate the honest feedback. I’ll make sure your suggestions are passed along to our R&D team for reference.

comments.text: Have they considered a sealing system to prevent sanding dust from entering the NeoSande, in order to extend its lifespan?

replies.text: Hi Francisco, if you look closely, there is a silicone cover at the front, which helps block dust from entering the mechanism while still allowing smooth reciprocating motion.

comments.text: Hi Hozo,

replies.text: Hi Paul, thanks for your support!

comments.text: Hi Hozo,

replies.text: Hi Hunter, thanks for the thoughtful questions — we’re really glad NeoSander looks like a good fit for your workflow!

comments.text: I've already pledged the NeoBlade and I couldn't be happier with it. So when I saw that the NeoSander was planned I just had to pledge. I am using some rather cheap rotiy tools from amazon and aliexpress for my occational sanding activities with 3D prints and some electronics stuff. The amount of times I slipped with these tools and ruined a print is unreal so I'm really exited for the NeoSander as I expect a similar performance to the NeoBlade and that would be a godsent for me. Therefore I hope the stability and control we can expect from the product is going to be as good as advertised :)

replies.text: Hi DrMiep, thanks so much for the kind words — and for backing both NeoBlade and NeoSander 🙌

comments.text: Hi

replies.text: Hi Michelle, thank you so much for backing early and for the kind words—we really appreciate the trust and long-time support!

comments.text: I love the variety of sanding heads, and I can't wait to try it out, buy there are a couple more head shapes that would be fantastic for miniature building (among other uses, I'm sure) that I would love to see:

replies.text: Hi Roger, thanks so much for sharing these ideas! Those head shapes sound really interesting, and we can definitely see how they’d be useful for miniature building and other detailed work.

project.name: Alpha Clash: Rising Empires by Mark Waid & AJ Light (#1-4)
project.description: An Explosive Sci-Fi Action Thriller Comic Series set in the Alpha Clash universe.

creator.name: Ridge Kiley (Alpha Clash)
creator.biography: CEO of Rising Empire Studios and the creator of Alpha Clash.

texte: From legendary writer Mark Waid (Kingdom Come, Daredevil) and Alpha Clash co-creator AJ Light comes a bold new sci-fi action thriller series set in the expanding Alpha Clash universe.
Rising Empires is a grounded, character-driven story about what happens after the world has already changed — and the people left behind to deal with it.

When the world changed, not everyone survived it.
Now, Alphas are vanishing.
What’s happening may be more dangerous than the powers themselves.

Rising Empires takes place five years after the events of The Awakening. As Alphas — individuals awakened with extraordinary powers — begin disappearing across the globe, and a new generation of heroes and villains is drawn into a conflict that threatens to reshape the future.

Dr. Sommers is a reluctant genius awakened with terrifying clarity. As he uncovers a global pattern of disappearing Alphas, his investigation pulls him into conflict with the enigmatic Nix, the charismatic but dangerous Everett Monk, and a new generation of Alphas including Razorback, Brick, and Huff.

The first four issues in this campaign are designed as a clean entry point into the Alpha Clash universe. No previous books are required, and longtime fans will still discover deeper connections woven throughout the story.

These issues are illustrated by some of the most talented artists working in comics today — creators whose work has appeared across Marvel, DC, BOOM! Studios, Image, Dark Horse, and other major publishers. These artists bring the world of Rising Empires to life with dynamic, collectible-quality variants crafted specifically for this series.

Alpha Clash is a fully connected, creator-owned universe spanning comics, a competitive trading card game, novels, a board game, TCG PVE expansion, and ongoing narrative storytelling. Rising Empires builds on the foundation established in The Awakening, Torque Therapy, and Cosmic Conquest, while standing entirely on its own for new readers.
When a mysterious event known as The Awakening reshapes the world, ordinary people across the globe suddenly manifest extraordinary abilities — and an overwhelming instinct to clash.

From that moment, Alpha Clash has followed the ripple effects of this event across time, generations, and worlds. Each story explores a different corner of a shared universe — from street-level conflicts to cosmic threats — all connected by characters whose choices shape what the future becomes.

Special 'Author's Margin Edition' features thoughts and notes from the authors.


Rising Empires sits at a critical point in that timeline. It’s the moment when the dust has settled, the world has adapted… and something new begins to move in the shadows.

You don’t need to know everything that came before to understand this story. But for readers who choose to go deeper, Alpha Clash is a universe built to reward curiosity — one that continues to grow across comics, games, and beyond.
Hardcover Coffee Table books contain comics, sketches, scripts, and more.

Mark Waid — Co-Writer / Editor
A multiple New York Times-bestselling author and Eisner Award winner whose work has appeared in countless languages across the globe. Over the course of his four decades in the comic book industry, Waid has written and edited over 2,000 comic titles and received every major award.

He has developed characters and written stories for both DC and MARVEL COMICS – Batman, Superman, Spider-Man, The Avengers, X-Men, Archie, Star Wars, The Incredibles, Fantastic Four, Wonder Woman, Daredevil, Captain America – and almost every other franchise currently enjoying success across all media platforms.

KINGDOM COME, which Waid co-created for DC Comics, has become one of the best-selling graphic novels in history. Many of the storylines and characters he wrote and created in his eight-year run on THE FLASH comic books were featured on the hit television series.

AJ Light — Co-Writer / Creator
A writer and storyteller whose work has helped shape the foundation of the Alpha Clash universe from its earliest days as a Co-founder of Rising Empire Studios. As author of The Awakening novel, Torque Therapy comic, and Cosmic Conquest comic series, Light has been instrumental in defining the tone, characters, and narrative direction of the IP. His writing blends clear, grounded characterization with large-scale world building, creating stories that resonate with fans.

Beyond the comics, Light has worked to develop narrative cohesion across the trading card game, novels, and connected media, ensuring the universe grows with consistency and intention. His work continues to set the stage for future expansions of the Alpha Clash story, both on the page and across its broader cross-media platform.

Ridge & Garett Kiley — Producers
Co-founders of Rising Empire Studios and producers behind the expanding Alpha Clash universe. Since launching the company, the brothers have helped lead its growth across multiple mediums — including comics, the competitive Alpha Clash Trading Card Game, novels, board games, and connected narrative projects. They oversee much of the creative, production, and publishing efforts that bring the universe to life, working closely with writers, artists, and designers to ensure every new release aligns with the larger vision for the IP.

Through their direction, Rising Empire Studios has established itself as a dedicated independent publisher focused on building a cohesive, character-driven world that spans both print and interactive storytelling. Their hands-on approach and long-term planning continue to guide the evolution of Alpha Clash and its expanding slate of creative initiatives.

Josh Horton — Marketing 
A multi-platform influencer and marketing strategist whose digital footprint spans millions of followers across YouTube, Instagram and TikTok. This co-owner of Rising Empire Studios has a background in social media campaigns, brand partnerships and content creation for major entertainment clients, Josh brings powerful promotional reach and audience engagement to the Rising Empires campaign. His involvement means your pledge doesn’t just support a comic book — it gains visibility through a populous, active community already tuned into comics and pop-culture.
Every backer receives digital access, and every physical tier includes unlocked stretch goals revealed throughout the campaign.
As funding grows, unlocked stretch goals are added to eligible pledges at no additional cost.
Enhance your pledge with optional add-ons, including exclusive items and extras available only during this campaign.

Independent comics exist because readers choose to believe in them. Your pledge directly empowers our writers, artists, and production team to tell this story the right way — and to keep Alpha Clash creator-owned and community-supported.

Many of the books, covers, and collectibles in this campaign are exclusive to this moment and will never be printed again. Backing now isn’t just a purchase — it’s becoming part of the journey and helping ensure these stories continue to exist because readers like you chose to support them.

All rewards will be shipped worldwide from Rising Empire Studios’ U.S. facility.
Estimated fulfillment: August/September 2026.

Actual shipping costs are calculated in a post-campaign pledge manager based on region and weight. Estimated shipping costs are subject to change. Import duties, taxes, and fees are not included in estimates and are the buyer's responsibility.
Every pledge helps build a universe where comics, games, and stories collide into something truly original. Thank you for being part of Rising Empires and the future of Alpha Clash.

comments.text: I've been really looking forward to see what has happened after the novel. I'm also really excited for that portal coin.
Ya had me at shiny cardboard. Looking forward to where this story leads tho🔥
This new era of comics is going to be incredible! I can't wait to learn how far the world has come since new York!

I am counting the days to read this new story and to see the new decks so I can teach my friends how to play. Greetings to everyone from Costa Rica! I hope the game arrives here this year with the new set.
Can’t wait to see and read this new Alpha Clash story. New Heroes and Villains. After reading the novel. Seeing what happens 5 years later will be very interesting and exciting.

Can't wait to get my hands on those cards! I loved the comics that have been released already but I've been craving more of the current timeline story so I'm really excited to see what comes next in these issues!
Looking forward to reading this amazing collab with Mark Waid & AJ Light! Excited for this next chapter in the Alpha Clash Universe! 🔥
Can't wait to read the series! Love seeing the AC universe continue to expand 💜
Looking forward to seeing what the next chapter in Alpha Clash looks like.
I will admit to being dismayed that for a CCG Centrist property, in order to get built-In playable CCG Cards, you must pledge no less than $99.

replies.text: I think the TCG product being a fun add-on at higher tiers is fine. The company doesn't solely revolve around the TCG but does include products as bonuses for additional support which is pretty standard in the space. With the cards not being mechnically unique or high rarity staples there is no need for the TCG player base to fret over alt-art promos

project.name: RICKY Film Pay-It-Forward $250,000 Impact Campaign
project.description: Help impacted communities see this Sundance award-winning film in theaters.

creator.name: Ossetra Films
creator.biography: Here to tell pure authentic stories that empower voices and bring truth to the forefront

texte: This is a $250,000 campaign to support a limited nation-wide theatrical release of RICKY. Your purchase of movie tickets or a theater buyout helps us get the film to audiences that need to see it most.
RICKY is the debut feature film from director Rashad Frett, winner of the 2025 Sundance Directing Award (U.S. Dramatic Competition).

Based on Frett’s 2023 short film of the same name, RICKY follows a 30-year-old ex-offender navigating life after incarceration. The film stars Stephan James (If Beale Street Could Talk), Sheryl Lee Ralph (Abbott Elementary), and Titus Welliver (Bosch), and premiered at Sundance to strong critical acclaim — 89% on Rotten Tomatoes and 80 on Metacritic.
Rooted in authenticity, humanity, and social realism, RICKY explores themes of redemption, masculinity, systemic inequality, and community.

Following its award-winning Sundance premiere, our team quickly realized that — despite genuine interest from distributors — the marketplace for character-driven dramas and independent films is the most fragile it’s been in years. We were told there was “no market” for stories like this. Rather than accept that, we chose to take control of the film’s future. We believe the safest hands to deliver RICKY to the right audiences — and the right communities — are our own.

This film resonates far beyond incarceration. Whether someone has lived that experience or simply recognizes their own struggle in Ricky’s journey, our goal is to spark real conversations about re-entry, resilience, and the human cost of starting over. At the same time, we want to shine a light on the state of independent filmmaking itself — an art form at risk in today’s industry.
Now is the time to push back.

We’re launching this Pay-It-Forward campaign to give the community a voice — to let audiences decide which stories deserve space on the big screen. Through this campaign, you can pre-purchase a ticket for our upcoming theatrical release (venues TBD) or buy a ticket for someone else who might not otherwise have access.

We’re also partnering with youth programs and social-justice organizations focused on prison reform and re-entry support, helping bring RICKY directly to the communities most affected by these issues.
Below are some of the youth programs and social-justice organizations that we are looking to partner with:
Atlanta Area:
Baltimore Area:
Chicago Area:
Detroit Area:
Los Angeles Area:
New York City Area:
Hartford Area:
Philadelphia Area:
St. Louis Area:
Our mission is simple: to start conversations, build empathy, and rewrite the narrative around who gets to be seen — and whose stories are worth telling.
See you at the theater.

project.name: INARI
project.description: INARI is a high-speed kunai action platformer set in an Eastern fantasy world.

creator.name: 1HP STUDIO
creator.biography: Inari is a high-speed kunai action platformer set in an Eastern fantasy world.

texte:
INARI is a high-speed kunai action platformer set in an Eastern fantasy world.

You are an executioner sent to hunt down the Seven Daughters who dared to defy the mighty Lord. Master rapid, ruthless combat using kunai and instant teleportation, and survive the extreme tension of clinging to a single life.

Cut through the battlefield before fate catches you.

Patch Version: v0.2.1 
OS : windows
Recommended Specs: i5-9400F / GTX 1060 / 8GB RAM / 2GB Storage
Controller Support: Xbox, PlayStation DualShock

The music of INARI pulls you into a world where Eastern fantasy collides with Steampunk. Traditional instruments blend with metallic textures and mechanical beats, creating a sound that's unmistakably INARI. Every track was crafted to match the emotional intensity of our game. Listen to selected tracks below.
ㅤ

For generations, the High Realm has sought to dominate the mortal world. Now, you have been chosen to enforce their will. You are Izuna, Executor of the High Realm—known to mortals as the Reaper.
Your mission: hunt down and eliminate the Seven Daughters, princesses who dared to defy the heavens. Your first target awaits at the Bronze Citadel—Princess Ikane's domain, where mortal technology has reached its apex.Colossal gears and machinery grind endlessly, while troops and traps stand ready to crush all intruders.But you cannot waver.
The Lord's will is absolute, and failure is not an option.
The protagonist, Izuna, infiltrates the Bronze Citadel. As you carve a path forward, you must harness the power of the Reaper to carry out your mission.

INARI is a story-driven action platformer where narrative and gameplay intertwine. As you confront each Princess, hidden truths of the world are gradually revealed. Every level challenges your mastery and precision. Every stage ends in a climactic boss fight that tests everything you've learned so far.

In INARI, the kunai is more than a weapon—it's your lifeline. Throw a kunai and instantly teleport to its location. Both combat and platforming are built around this single mechanic. Teleport aggressively to ambush enemies, or evade death at the last possible moment. Mastering teleportation is the key to controlling the battlefield.You have only 1 HP. One hit means death. Battles demand flawless judgment and perfect timing. (If this sounds too punishing, don’t worry. A Story Mode with multiple HP is also available.)

INARI places a strong emphasis on precise, responsive controls. Izuna moves with the speed and agility of a fox. Running, jumping, and wall-climbing flow seamlessly. Fluid frame-by-frame animations bring her to life, making every movement feel sharp and satisfying.Levels feature mechanics like freezing devices that alter combat flow and timed challenges that reward fast clears.

The Seven Daughters are the seven princesses that protect the Mortal Realm from the Lord’s tyranny. Each wields a unique power to defy the heavens. However, insolence must be met with war, and rebellion with eternal ruin.
You are the Lord's Executor, sent to restore the Heavenly Order.
Your first target is Princess Ikane.

Ikane is a brilliant strategist who sparked a technological revolution. From her seat at the Bronze Citadel, she's built an impenetrable defense network. Advanced troops and lethal traps lie in wait throughout her castle. You'll need to dismantle them one by one to reach her. 
Ikane won't face you directly. Instead, she's already calculated your invasion. Every trap, every defense mechanism has been positioned with surgical precision. The entire Citadel is her chessboard, and every battle unfolds according to her design.Each Princess fights with a distinct style shaped by their power and ideology. Combat evolves as you progress, constantly shifting the flow of battle. This constant variation is at the heart of what makes INARI compelling.

Story matters in INARI. Key moments unfold through cinematic sequences. During dialogue, illustrated portraits shift with the conversation, reflecting the deep, subtle emotions of individuals caught in the midst of war. Following intense battles, these quieter moments carry the story forward, drawing you deeper into the world and its unfolding conflict.

The highlight of INARI lies in its intense one-on-one boss battles. The boss, Commander Kamura, reacts instantly to your teleportation and counters aggressively. As pressure mounts, bosses strike back just as relentlessly, creating intense, back-and-forth duels where every moment is charged with tension.Victory is decided by split-second decisions and absolute mastery.
The following games were major sources of inspiration during the development of INARI. We are fans of these titles ourselves, and they taught us a great deal throughout the process.

INARI’s gameplay is rooted in fast-paced action games that demand precision and mastery. Its core mechanic, kunai-based teleportation, was inspired by Minato from Naruto, while the one-hit-death rule and high-tempo combat were influenced by Katana ZERO, Celeste,and Ghostrunner.

We also drew inspiration from Hollow Knight’s background art style and Nine Sols’ interpretation of Eastern fantasy, bringing these influences together to shape INARI’s distinct action and atmosphere.
Physical PC edition of the full game. Comes in a custom-printed case featuring game artwork. Includes a standalone executable and a Steam key.

Artbook A comprehensive artbook featuring the world of INARI, including backgrounds, characters, story, and lore. Also includes early concepts, unused assets, and cut ideas, documenting the game’s full development process.

Special Tier Rewards (Participatory Rewards) Participatory rewards give you a direct hand in shaping the game. Once the campaign successfully funds and payments clear, we'll send you a backer survey to go over the initial concept of the reward. From there, we'll work closely with you to dial in the specifics.

To keep things transparent: some elements may need adjustments based on our production schedule, game balance, or content rating considerations. We'll collaborate with you to find the best solution that fits both your vision and the game's needs.
ㅤ

We met at the same university, united by a single goal: to create the game we truly wanted to make. Living together in a small studio apartment, we worked day and night shaping the game and its world. In 2022, the first version of INARI was born.
When showcased at exhibitions, the response exceeded our expectations.
INARI was featured in indie game magazines and received strong player feedback. However, as students, we were forced to pause development.

After graduation, each of us gained experience in the game industry but INARI never left our minds. Eventually, we reunited to pursue indie development once again. That decision marked the beginning of 1HP STUDIO.

1HP STUDIO: The real fight begins at 1 HP
Just like in action games, the most thrilling moment comes when only one hit point remains. We believe this is where a game truly begins. We chose the name 1HP STUDIO as a reminder to make every moment count and commit fully to our game, even with limited resources.

Communication with our players has always been one of our highest priorities. Over the past year, we built a playable demo and shared multiple builds at game exhibitions. The direct feedback we received there became a key reference point for improving the game. The current version of INARI is the result of that ongoing dialogue.
We continue to stay closely connected with our community through Discord and social media, believing that shared passion and open communication lead to better games—and always will.
We believe transparency is essential. While exact costs are difficult to predict, we are committed to clearly sharing how your support will be used.
Starget provided support in setting up our Kickstarter account.

comments.text: Awesome art, and great demo! I loved zipping around with the kunai, and you totally sold me on the vision for your project. My only issue is sometimes I would mark an enemy, but couldn't do the follow up attack because the yellow lock on square wasn't on them. (I played on controller, btw). I think it would feel much better if I always attacked marked enemies as long as I attacked in the mark circle. Maybe I could even hit multiple enemies at once if I was in more than one circle! project.name: SINK YOUR TEETH IN #1 - Mature Sapphic Noir Chicago Vampires
project.description: An undead PI hunts a missing vamp, facing ancient Mob Families, corrupt cops, & a past she buried to survive. Zoe Tunnell/Lauren Knight

creator.name: Deathline (from Lifeline Comics)
creator.biography: Deadline is an imprint of Lifeline Comics featuring lead Editor Michele Abounader alongside Kat Calamia and Phil Falco.

texte: The DEATHline imprint of Lifeline Comics brings you a brand new 22-page comic from writer of comics Zoe Tunnell, and artist Lauren Knight!

Chicago is a vampire town. Has been for years. Divided between four rival factions of influential undead, every drop of the city's lifeblood runs through them. And Corsica Smith barely sees any of it. Having long since fallen from her once-powerful place in the city’s elite, she scrapes by as a bottom-rate private eye.

Decades spent solving petty disputes and catching cheating spouses leaving her trapped in a menial hell. But when her first real mystery in a decade throws her into a web of secrets and death, with her long-absent ex-lover at its center, as captivating as ever, she can't stop herself from taking the case. Quickly finding themselves on the run and seeking answers, the two former lovers are forced to rely on each other and find out the best-kept secret in vampire society...if they don’t kill each other first.
We have five unique covers for this exciting debut issue - including a NSFW variant!
Our hero, Corsica, peering through the blinds, looking out for either her next client or her ex...
An homage to the classic movie poster for Breakfast at Tiffany's.
NSFW variant featuring Corsica and Florence!
A custom decorated cake made for Sink Your Teeth In #1 crafted by ExistentialCrisisCakes!
Check them out on INSTAGRAM 🎂

Corsica Smith - she/her - Our lead. A brilliant journalism major turned undead broker of secrets, Corsica was once one of Chicago’s most influential vampires. A favorite of Adeline, one of the city’s faction leaders, there were few secrets Corsica couldn’t find out and turn to her own advantage. But when she dug a little too deep and uncovered secrets about Adeline herself, and her ties to the other Families of Chicago, she only survived by cashing in every valuable piece of information in her care. With no money and even less respect, Corsica was forced to put her skills to use as a second-rate private investigator. After decades of scraping by and wasting her brilliant mind uselessly mediating petty squabbles, she’s desperate to do anything that might give her the life she once held...even if it could cost her what little life she has left.

Florence Carmichael - she/her - Corsica’s long-lost ex-lover, a vampire who has been around since the late 1800s. A dirt-poor farmer's daughter turned cunning socialite, Florence has survived for nearly two centuries relying on her ruthless wits and deadly charm. The one-time owner of a vampire club in Chicago, she is the one who turned Corsica and the pair had an intimate affair as one of the city’s premiere power couples. But after Corisca’s fall from grace Florence vanished without a word. Now back in the city, and harboring a secret, she is on the run from unknown forces and seeks safety with the only person she can trust only to find her barely a shadow of the vampire she left behind.
Every Kickstarter, we like to offer a special item that is included with your Rewards FOR FREE if you pledge a certain amount.
This time, we're offering an exclusive ENAMEL PIN featuring some bloody fangs, FOR FREE to anyone who supports this project for $30 or more (before shipping)!

If you spend $30+ Before Shipping (the cost of your Reward Tier + Add-ons), and pledge at a Physical Level (have some Rewards shipped to you), you'll receive the enamel pin FOR FREE!

We recommend checking out our Variant Cover Reward Tiers and higher to automatically qualify for the free item!
Every Kickstarter, we include at least one exclusive item that can ONLY be purchased through this campaign.
And for this Kickstarter, we're producing a limited-edition METAL COVER print run of Skylar Patridge's Cover DD - printed on actual metal cover stock!

There will only be 20 copies of the "Bloody Valentine" Metal Cover available for separate purchased via Reward Tier and 15 via Add-ons. The "Bloody Valentine" Metal Cover is also automatically included in Collector's and Super Box tiers.
Lifeline Comics will be launching three vampire comics this month in what we’re calling our FANGuary Event!

Any backer who supports all three of our Vampire Comic Projects (with at least two backings being Physical, having some rewards shipped to you) will receive an EXCLUSIVE METAL COVER featuring the leads of all three Vampire series!
This Cover features Exclusive Art by Marco Maraggi and will be printed on actual metal cover stock. You’ll even get to choose which of the three comics you want to place the Metal Cover on top of!
If you're already supporting Sink Your Teeth In #1, you'll just need to support our other Vampire campaigns when they launch below!
"Can Vampire Snow White and Werewolf Belle survive an encounter with the Evil Queen, now a VAMPIRE/WEREWOLF HYBRID? Final Issue. Mature 18+"
Back This Project: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/comicuno/beast-snow-4?ref=4vvclx
"Liam Graves is a CHEERY VAMPIRE. Dean Hikaru is his GLOOMY CLASSMATE with a troubled past. OPPOSITES ATTRACT in this Boy Love romance."
Support The Project: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/philfalco/lasb1?ref=9zordf
Grab one of our most popular items, THE SINK YOUR TEETH IN BOX, featuring art by Skylar Patridge!
You'll receive your Rewards in this super cool box design if you support the campaign for any of our "Box" tiers:
More details on each of those Boxes in the Reward Tiers themselves, but we definitely recommend checking them out! It's truly the best deal on the page.
We absolutely love collectible Trading Cards, so we've created Card Sets for each of our comic properties - including Sink Your Teeth In!
Each card features a character on the card front...
with some fun stats on the card back!

This campaign introduces Wave 1 of "Sink Your Teeth In" Card Set with FIVE brand new cards (two HOLO and three COMMON). The ratio of Rare to Common cards is 1:6. Add multiple cards to try to collect them all!
You can get "Sink Your Teeth In" Trading Cards using:

Zoe Tunnell is a New Jersey-based writer of comics and prose such as BLADE MAIDENS, MARVEL UNITED: A PRIDE STORY, GODZILLA: VALENTINE'S DAY SPECIAL and POWER RANGERS: RITA'S REWIND. When not writing, she spends her days with her two cats, cooking frightening amounts of pasta, and annoying her loving partner.
BlueSky | Website

Lauren Knight is a queer comic artist and writer based in Scotland, she is the artist/co-creator of ‘GOLDEN RAGE,’ published by Image Comics. She has worked for Image, BOOM! Studios, IDW, and Dark Horse, and contributed to various anthologies including Let Her Be Evil & Witching Season.
BlueSky | Website

JP Jordan is a colourist/writer working out of Ireland. You can find his work in VR Troopers, Star Trek: Strange New Worlds, Scream, High On Life, Ploughman, Sagas of the Shield Maiden, From Parts Unknown, Grawlgore & Shanks and more TBA. You can find him at @jpjordan.bsky.social on Bluesky, or @jpthwip on Instagram. When he's not making comics, he can be found drinking a chai, whilst buried in books. To this date he's still 50/50 on if shoebills are real.
BlueSky | Website
Jodie Troutman is an aging millennial cartoonist who has lettered a lot of comic books for a lot of people, including Star Trek, Galaxy: As The World Falls Down, and assorted sad gays.
BlueSky | Website

Emily Schnall is a freelance illustrator working in comics, science communication, and publishing. When she’s not busy drawing pictures alone in a room, Emily likes to pet cats, forage for mushrooms, and make papier-mâché sculptures.
BlueSky | Website

Skylar Patridge is a comic creator, artist & illustrator living in New Mexico. She has done work for DC, Image, Marvel, BOOM!, Archie, Dark Horse, IDW & many more. Most notably, she has worked on ACTION COMICS and SUPERGIRL for DC Comics and is a co-creator & artist on FINDERS//KEEPERS from Image Comics.
BlueSky | Website

Vash Taylor is a trans, non-binary artist based in Toronto, Canada. They're known mostly for their work on Galaxy: The Prettiest Star and with Critical Role: Chronicles of Exandria/MIDST. While having a background in animation, their experience runs the gamut of book illustration, comics and games.
BlueSky | Instagram
Website | Instagram

Michele Abounader is an editor and writer of comics, with a passion for poetic narrative storytelling, anthologies, and amplifying new voices. She edited and crowdfunded comic anthologies The Color of Always, Sharp Wit & the Company of Women, Sapphic Pulp, and When I Was Young, Witching Season, and is the co-creator and writer of the FUNeral Home with Fell Hound.
BlueSky | Website

Kat Calamia is the co-writer and co-creator of "Slice of Life". You may know her best from her other creator owned titles - "Like Father, Like Daughter", "They Call Her...The Dancer" and "Bi Visibility: A Bisexual Comic Book Anthology".
She's also a comic book critic and journalist with weekly reviews on her YouTube channel, Comic Uno. She currently writes for Newsarama with bylines from IGN, DC Comics, Fandom and TV Guide.
Twitter | YouTube

Phil Falco is a queer, New York-based comic book writer and co-founder of Lifeline Comics. He's best known for his work as creator of supernatural horror series, "HAUNTING", and as co-writer and co-creator of Webtoon "Slice of Life".

He is also known for his work as co-creator and editor of comic book anthologies: "Rainbow Canvas: A Wholesome BL & GL WEBTOON Anthology", "Hairology: A Celebration of Hair", and "Bi Visibility: A Bisexual Comic Book Anthology".
BlueSky | Twitter | Instagram
For fans of autographed comics, we have a Reward Tier and Add-on where you can pledge to have your comic(s) signed by SYTI writer Zoe Tunnell!
NOTE: Any purchased signatures on standard comics will, by default, be on the Front Comic Cover. If you would prefer your signature on the Inside Credits Page, shoot us a DM and we'll make note.
Signatures on Metal Cover comics will always be on the Inside Credits Page.
In addition to our Reward Tiers on the right side of the page, you can grab even more awesome Add-on Items - including Enamel Pins, Stickers, Mystery Boxes and Comics!
All five Sink Your Teeth In #1 cover variants are available via both Reward Tiers and Add-ons!

As are our Kickstarter-Exclusive METAL Cover, the Mystery Box, a "Vamp Cake" Glitter Sticker, the Premium PDF Upgrade, a Curated Playlist of songs to accompany your reading of the issue, and SYTI Trading Cards!

All of these Mature Fairytale comics are available both Physically and Digitally.
"Gritty anime protagonist, Lady Vengeance, comes to life and falls in love with a closeted high school cheerleader."

Check out our WLW and Webtoon Canvas series: "Slice of Life"! You can grab Physical or Digital copies of over 450 pages of content across the "Slice of Life" Season 1 Graphic Novel (collecting issues 1-4) and single issues Slice of Life #5-8!
Also available is our SPIN-OFF one-shot - "Slice of Life: Anime Adventure"! Pokémon, Sailor Moon, Power Rangers, Dragon Ball Z and MORE anime tropes collide in this WEBTOON parody!

project.name: Rhino Rdy: The Modular Field System
project.description: Emergency readiness that deploys in seconds. One Core. Three Bags. Always Ready.

creator.name: RHINO RDY
creator.biography: Born on the fire line, Rhino Rdy builds equipment for when failure is not an option. After successfully delivering our first Kickstarter, we return with a single mission: bring order to chaos. We engineered a new class of modular carry that is overbuilt by necessity. Our system combines the precision of a tech pack with the resilience of a go bag for the backcountry, the roadside, and wherever demands more.

texte: A system that keeps essentials organized and ready in seconds.
The Result: One system that adapts to you. No re-packing. No chaos. Just grab and go.
30% off MSRP. Expected dispatch: August 2026.
Core-01 is the rigid platform that lets you move a ready loadout between bags in seconds. Fits most backpacks with 11×18 in internal space. No digging. No dumping. Just open and deploy.
FIELD VALIDATION: Modules are in active field validation. Specs may evolve slightly, but capability minimums stay fixed. Built to evolve.
Hydra (25L) The Amphibious - Water is the enemy. Hydra is the fortress. Featuring the most robust RF welded spec, this is 100% dry-carry utility.

Sentry (35L) The Responder - Speed is survival. Sentry opens fully flat in 2 seconds, transforming from a backpack into a vertical workstation. MOLLE compatible, allowing for streamlined expansion without the bulk. Our most mission capable.
Fury (45L) The Overlander - Distance requires depth. Maximized for vehicle sustainment and long-range travel. Fury is your mobile base built for the long haul.
Hardware is Life Support. We do not use off-the-shelf components. If a part didn't exist to meet our spec, we engineered it. Here are some of our many great partners.
Outer Materials: Constructed from high-tenacity Cordura®, ReCor®, Challenge Fabric, and Dimension-Polyant, Velcro®, YKK, and UTX Duraflex, we believe best in class is earned over time in the field.
The SKEL: The Core-01 is a proprietary injection-molded HDPE from impact-resistant polymer, tested to withstand sub-zero temps and high-impact.
Life Access: Oversized, glove-friendly zipper pulls and rapid-release hardware ensure you can operate the entire ecosystem in the dark, in the rain, or under high stress.
Jan 20: Campaign Live.
Feb 19: Campaign Closes (Price increases to MSRP).
Mar-Apr: Raw material acquisition and production tooling.
May-July: Final Assembly and Quality Control.
August: Global Deployment to backers.
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 3,500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $1B raised between them.

That makes sense, thank you for responding so quickly. How do the items stay in place within the bags? Are they like MaxExpedition pouches with elastic straps and pockets etc? There's nothing worse than moving with your equipment pinging about inside your bag! Thanks :-)

Well what I’m thinking is the black straps on the front of the bag make a hook to attach it to the core1. Or maybe make it hold together with Velcro so that we can aswell put patches on there.
Every pack does have a loop field for patches, but I see where you're coming from as well. Will kick it around with the rest of the team. Appreciate the insight Joran.

titre: If you’re reading this, CONGRATULATIONS! You survived 2025!
Let's recap some of the things that we have (barely) survived over the last 5 years!
texte: When you do something remarkable, you should be rewarded. Like a badge of honor to wear proudly on your chest, a trophy to display in your trophy room, or… this sticker.
Because let’s be real, making it through this past year was a remarkable thing for everyone. Great job, everybody.
Just think about it…

This year, we witnessed massive wildfires that wiped out entire communities, escalating armed conflicts around the world, an earthquake that cracked the top ten largest ever recorded, and scientists basically "Jurassic-Parking" Dire Wolves. We watched astronauts get rescued from space (while also sending Katy Perry to space for some reason), “Alligator Alcatraz,” floods, assassinations, and so much more.
What a year.
So go ahead—follow along, grab a sticker, wear it proudly, and maybe pick up a few extras for the people in your life who also deserve a little recognition for making it through.
Oh, and act fast! The first 100 backers will receive a special bonus sticker with their pledge!
Every year, I design a new sticker to try to capture a snapshot of everything we collectively lived through. It's always hard to decide what makes it onto the sticker and what gets left out.

Below is a breakdown of this year’s design and what each part represents. If there’s something that I missed that you feel like absolutely had to be included (or something you’re surprised made the cut), I’d genuinely love to hear your thoughts!

Hi, my name is Tyler Smith. I’m an illustrator and high school teacher living in Utah. I love hanging out with my wife and kids. I also enjoy Star Wars, sports, fun socks, and drawing aliens and monsters. It’s a pretty good life.

These “I (Barely) Survived” sticker projects have been happening every year for the past six years. It all started back in 2020, when the whole world went through something really difficult together—and somehow, it’s just kept going ever since.
Thanks for being here and for helping keep this little tradition alive.
2020 brought with it a worldwide pandemic, murder hornets, wildfires, earthquakes, runs on toilet paper, and UFOs being confirmed by the Pentagon. (Just to name a few!)
BUT YOU SURVIVED!

2021 seemed promising for a little less than a week before we were facing riots at the United States Capitol, nasty COVID variants, extreme shipping delays, more fires, earthquakes, and other natural disasters, and many other crazy things. It even got to the point where several billionaires decided it wasn't worth being on Earth anymore, so they started investing their resources into developing private space travel.
YET, YOU STILL SURVIVED!

Many of us held onto a small glimmer of hope that 2022 would finally be the year things turned around…
and, well… you know how that went.
Two massive volcanoes later, a devastating conflict between Russia and Ukraine, more sickness, hurricanes, and even the passing of the Queen—2022 was anything but calm and peaceful.
BUT YOU SURVIVED ALL OF THAT TOO!

Then came 2023. You experienced coordinated orca attacks, an A.I. revolution, so many devastating wars and conflicts across the globe, earthquakes, the Taylor Swift effect, volcanic eruptions, Ocean Gate, and so much more!
ONCE AGAIN, YOU SURVIVED!
2024 continued the chaos. Multiple assassination attempts. Even more devastating wars. Terrible hurricanes. Airport backups. And Australia’s hip-hop routine at the Olympics. (Yikes.)

Things got so bad that we took a break by watching adorable animals on the internet—
ONLY FOR THEM TO EXECUTE PEANUT THE SQUIRREL.
(Sure, he may have had rabies, but it’s 2024. What did you expect?)
AT THIS POINT, YOUR SURVIVAL INSTINCTS WERE CLEARLY UNMATCHED!
And then there was 2025.
If you’ve made it this far, you’ve proven—over and over again—that you can handle hard things. You are resilient. You are adaptable. You keep going.

This year, we witnessed massive wildfires, escalating armed conflicts, a top-ten earthquake, scientists “Jurassic-Parking” Dire Wolves, astronauts being rescued from space (while also sending Katy Perry up there for some reason), “Alligator Alcatraz,” floods, assassinations, and so much more.
LET IT BE KNOWN, YOU ARE A SURVIVOR!

And now, for the moment you’ve all been waiting for… THE REWARDS.
(Thunderous applause. Standing ovation. Someone wipes away a tear.)

Below is a list of the different reward tiers you can choose from. Once you’ve selected the one that feels right, you are officially encouraged to stand up, wave politely, and deliver your acceptance speech... after all, you’ve earned it!

One quick note before we begin:
For the past five years, the basic reward tier has been $3. With rising production and shipping costs, I’ve finally had to increase it to $4 this year. From the very beginning, it’s been important to me to keep this project as accessible as possible, and I sincerely hope this still allows both new and returning backers to participate because I’m grateful for every single one of you.
Thank you for understanding, and thank you for being here!
(Available worldwide)
Includes:
This is the heart of the project. One sticker to commemorate one very eventful year.

If you’ve backed this project before, welcome back.
If this is your first year, welcome! And congratulations on surviving 2025!
(Available worldwide)
Includes:
This tier is the full record so far. A growing archive of everything we’ve collectively lived through since 2020.
It’s perfect for first-time backers who want to catch up, longtime backers who want the complete set, or really anyone who likes the idea of turning chaos into something tangible.
(Available worldwide)
Includes:
This tier includes everything I’m making for this project.
If you enjoy collecting stickers, love the art, or just want to fully commit to the tradition, this is the easiest way to do it.
(If you’re on the fence between tiers, this is usually the one people are happiest they chose.)
(Limited – up to 100 backers)
Includes:
This tier is for anyone who wants something completely unique.

I’ll work with you to create a custom sticker based on you, your family, your pet, or just a fun idea you’ve always wanted to see drawn. It’s personal, a little absurd, and a fun way to support the project at a deeper level.
This tier is limited because it takes a lot of extra time, but it's always fun for me to create something that is unique to you.
Check your email or the updates from any of my past sticker campaigns to find out how to back these rewards that are only available to returning backers.

If you are new here, thank you for joining this fun yearly tradition! I'm excited to continue adding special rewards as a way of saying thank you to everyone who has continued to return year after year. Next year, this could be you! (Well... you know, assuming you continue to survive...)

You can add any individual sticker to your pledge for an additional $1-5 (based on availability.) This is the final year that these stickers will be available, so get them while you still can! Once they are gone, they will be gone forever!
You can add additional sticker sheets to your pledge for $5 per sheet.
COMING SOON (If we hit our Stretch Goals!)
Postcards from previous campaigns are now available for you to add to your pledge for an additional $3.
(Pictures coming soon...)
Choose any of my illustrations that you would like to have on a shirt.
One of my favorite parts of this project is watching it grow. The more people who join in, the more fun things I get to make! And the more you get to enjoy!
None of these are required for the project to succeed, but they make it way more fun! Think of them as collective bonuses we unlock together as this tradition continues.
A brand-new mini sticker pack becomes available. (Several people over the years have suggested smaller versions of the "I (barely) Survived" Stickers. This is how that happens!
(Same stickers, just smaller...)
A new illustrated postcard is added to every order.
Another new sticker pack becomes available.
Postcards also become available.
(Pictures coming soon...)
A special bonus sticker is added to every order.
Another new sticker pack becomes available
(Pictures coming soon...)
A themed set of illustrated backgrounds designed to match the 2025 sticker universe becomes available as a free digital download.
Another new sticker pack becomes available.
(Pictures coming soon...)
A special surprise reward is unlocked for everyone and added to every order.
If we make it here, it deserves something worth celebrating. I’m keeping this one a surprise for now—but I promise it’ll be good.
And that's it!
Thank you for supporting this project!

Now, let's each do our part to make 2026 the year where we finally turn this whole thing around. I'm getting a little tired of all the drama and destruction. Although, admittedly, it is pretty fun to draw...
Keep surviving!
Sincerely,
Tyler

gone.name: I (barely) Survived 2025! Sticker
gone.desc:
3x3 inch, high quality, waterproof, original sticker illustrated and designed by me.

Just think about it, this year we witnessed.... massive wildfires, armed conflicts around the world, an earthquake that cracked the top ten ever recorded, and scientists basically Jurassic-Parking Dire Wolves. We watched astronauts get rescued from space (while also sending Katy Perry to space for some reason), “Alligator Alcatraz,” floods, assassinations, and so much more. What a year!

*Backing at this tier means that you are not eligible for receiving awards from stretch goals.

project.name: Naya Connect: The All-In-One Keyboard Ecosystem
project.description: The infinitely customisable ecosystem.

creator.name: Naya
creator.biography: CES Award Winning Modular Keyboard Ecosystem for Developers, Creative and Business Professionals.

titre: From the Makers of Naya Create
Built for How You Actually Work
Naya Type: The Premium Mechanical Foundation.
Naya Dock: Your Gateway to Precision Control
Naya Flow Software: One Interface, Endless Configurations
texte: Three years ago, Naya Create became the fourth-biggest crowdfunding campaign in Dutch history. 1,700 backers believed in a vision: that keyboards and mice haven't evolved with how we actually work. We delivered on that promise, with every single Naya Create unit shipped, and validated something important: modular input works. People want their hands to stay on the keyboard. They want precision tools at home row. They want to stop breaking flow.

We always knew Create was not for everyone. The niche form factor, notable learning curve, and premium price point left a lot of people on the sidelines. The feedback was consistent: "I love the modules, but I'm not ready to commit to re-learning how to type". Create was just the beginning, 

Welcome Naya Connect.

Connect is the evolution of everything we learned from Create. Building on three years of module development, community feedback, and real-world use. We kept the modular system that people loved. We kept the ecosystem approach. Since day one you asked us to give you our modules standalone: Finally, the universal Naya Dock for all of our modules! Combined with a familiar, low-profile, customizable and premium build mechanical keyboard: Naya Type. And an ecosystem of snap-on Attachments: Naya Multipad and Naya 6-Key.

The idea is simple: Start with what you need now and expand over time. Use modules with your current keyboard via the Dock. Or go all-in with Naya Type for the full integrated ecosystem. Either way, you're not locked in, you're connected.
Modular input shouldn't be a luxury just for the committed few. Everyone deserves a tailor made solution. That's the vision that Naya Connect is built upon.

Developers have their mechanical keyboards and macro pads. Business pros have their spreadsheet shortcuts and numpads. Video editors and 3D artists have their dials and 3D navigation devices. But every one of these tools lives in its own silo, hardware and software completely isolated from each other. So when you switch projects, when your tools update, when your role evolves, you're back to square one. New hardware. New software. New learning curve.
We're unifying all of it into one ecosystem, upgradable, exchangeable, adjustable. Perfectly tailored to how you work, and built to grow with you.
Programmable layers. App-specific profiles. Macro banks that switch automatically between VS Code and terminal.

A numpad that appears when spreadsheets demand it. Shortcut strips that surface macros for slide decks. Gesture control for seamless navigation. One device, endlessly reconfigurable all with zero desk clutter.
Six degrees of freedom with Float. Expandability to add whatever your pipeline requires.

Scrub through hours of footage in seconds or land on the exact frame you need. Tune gives you haptic timeline control that adapts to your pace, while Track handles precision adjustments. Configure everything per app, so Premiere and DaVinci each feel like home.
Navigate with precision using Track. Tune through frequencies or timelines with haptic feedback. Configure everything per app from Ableton and beyond.

Look at your desk. A keyboard here, mouse there. A numpad gathering dust. A macro pad you swore you'd use more. Some sticky notes to help you remember short-cuts. Maybe a dial, maybe a calculator, definitely too many cables. Every tool you've added promised to help but now you're managing the clutter instead of your work.
We took a different approach: every piece works in harmony together.
Add one Module with a Dock, or two, or three and the whole system goes wireless.
Each input module (Touch, Tune, Track, Float) carries its own battery, which power the entire system.
The Type Keyboard attaches magnetically or works on its own with USB-C.
The Multipad snaps onto either side of the board when you need a numpad.
The 6-Key strip tucks in wherever you want shortcuts.
Configure it your way. One system, fully integrated.

85 hot-swappable Kailh Choc V2 switches in a precision-machined aluminum unibody. At just 14.9mm thin and half the volume of other high-end mechanicals, Type travels where other keyboards can't, yet delivers the typing experience pros demand.

From different body finishes, to varying keycap designs and colours, to switch type. Not only is Naya Connect customizable with our unique magnetic snap-on system, and input modules, but you can also customize the visual and aesthetic elements as well.

Choose from 5 switch options. Pre-installed in 3 variants. Swap in seconds with zero soldering. And in case a switch breaks, it’s quick and easy to repair all while being lower profile than any standard Kaihua hot-swappable keyboard.

We design with our community, not just for them. When we polled your wishes you were near perfectly split between 3 keys for layers, and the traditional layout. So we did both. We designed Type to easliy hotswap between both options - and it always ship with both options in the box: a single spacebar or 3-key split.

Use it standalone or connect it to Type, Multipad, 6-Key, or chain it to another Module Dock. Snap in up to one of four modules magnetically, each with its own battery, powering your entire setup wirelessly.
Multi-finger gesture touchpad with customizable zones. Map different actions to different areas. Swipe, tap, pinch—all programmable.
Fully programmable trackball with 4 buttons, integrated scrolling, and axis locking. Precision cursor control for business tasks, audio, design, coding and other detailed creative work.

Instantly reprogrammable tuning resistance at the press of a key. No friction when you need speed. Fine detents when you need precision. Stronger ticks to feel your tabs. A rotary encoder and gesture-pad in one, fully adjustable to how you work. Co-winner of our second CES Innovation Award.

3× the range of motion of industry-standard spacemice - redesigned from the ground up. This means tighter axis control, true separation between movements, and speed that scales from quick to sub-millimeter precise. You stop choosing between fast and accurate—you get both. All with an ergonomic cap and integrated dial. Built for 3D modeling, animation, game development, and CAD. Co-winner of our second CES Innovation Award.

Numpad for spreadsheet warriors. Macropad for developers and editors. Custom command center for workflows we haven't imagined yet. Comes with an extra keycap set featuring a broad range of workflow-specific icons which you can swap to match your setup. Attaches directly to Type via pogo-pins, left or right side, your choice. No cables. No pairing. Just snap on.
Visual Tiles (24 Hot-Swappable Choc V2 Switches, Full RGB, Individually Addressable, Fully Programmable with Naya Flow, Three Pre-Configured Keycap Sets incl. Icon Keycap set)

Six programmable keys wherever you want quick access. Media controls. App launchers. Layer toggles. Workflow triggers. Tucks in anywhere your setup needs a shortcut or acting as additional layer keys for your Type keyboard or Module & Dock.

Your command center for the entire Naya ecosystem. App-specific profiles that switch automatically. Full remapping for every button, dial, touchpad zone, and gestures. Adjustable haptics for Tune. Axis configuration for Float. Custom gesture zones for Touch. Scroll and button configuration for Track. Layers and profiles for power users and simplicity for everyone else.
Re-engineered from the ground up to be powerful AND accessible. No command lines. No config files. No subscriptions. Just full control over your hardware.

And because your keyboard, dial, touchpad, trackball, 3D nav, and macro keys all live in one unified ecosystem, they share the same software. Configure once, sync everywhere. Toggle between your desktop, laptop, and tablet instantly - each with its own profiles and layers configured exactly how you need them. What used to require juggling five different apps now happens in one place, seamlessly.
Reassign any key on any device visually. See your changes instantly.
Every key individually addressable across your entire ecosystem. Create visual indicators for your layers and key categories.
Your entire layout switches automatically when you change applications. Premiere gets one config. VS Code gets another.
Configure trackball and touchpad sensitivity, touchpad zones, Tune's haptic profiles, Float's sensitivity, and so much more. All from one interface.

Different language setups: US Qwerty and German Qwertz with supported keycap sets; other languages can be configured on software-side. COLEMAK, DVORAK, or completely custom. Remap to your heart's content.
Traditional peripherals become obsolete when your needs change. Naya Connect grows with your career.
Choose your entry point. Type keyboard, Module Dock, or both.
Snap on a Multipad(s), 6-Key(s) or Module Dock(s) via pogo-pins. No cables. No pairing.
Slide Track, Touch, Tune, or Float into the Module Dock.
Naya Flow software—one interface for your entire ecosystem.
14.9mm thin. Cross-platform. Your setup travels with you.
Add capabilities as your needs change. Swap switches when your preferences shift.
We're a hardware startup from the Netherlands on a mission to reimagine how people interact with their computers.

Our co-founders — Niclas, Moritz, and Tom — have spent the past few years building Naya alongside a team of about 15 people passionate about creating tools that actually make a difference in how you work. Between us, we bring over 50 years of combined hardware manufacturing experience, but what we're most proud of is what we've already shipped.

In 2023, we launched Naya Create on Kickstarter. It became the fourth-biggest crowdfunding campaign in Dutch history, raising over $700K on Kickstarter alone and attracting 1,700 backers from around the world. Since then, we've delivered thousands of units globally and learned a ton from our community about what works, what doesn't, and where modular input needs to go next.

Naya Connect is the result of those lessons. We've taken everything that made Create special — the build quality, the module ecosystem, the community feedback— and made it accessible to a much wider audience. This isn't just an evolution of our product lineup; it's us doubling down on our vision that input devices should be modular, customizable, and built to adapt to how you work.
We're grateful you're here. Let's build the future of input together.
or at support@naya.tech

We work with large-scale, experienced third-party fulfillment partners already for our previous project and sister company. Shipping costs will be charged before fulfillment once Naya Connect is close to ready.
Shipping fees can be checked by selecting your "Shipping Destination" before clicking pledge.
After the campaign ends, and before we start fulfillment we will send a survey to each backer to confirm your final address, and any other shipping-related information we need to ship your rewards.
Here is a list of shipping cost estimates by region based on quotes from our fulfillment partners. We are committed to keeping these estimates as a maximum, or reducing them where possible.
Disclaimer: Shipping to remote areas within the regions may incur an additional surcharge of up to 20 EUR.
