comments.text: I don't see anyway of adding the PDF for issue 4. If I add it as the first selection, I can't get any physical copies.

I love the humor and the way you tell the story! The feeling of "freshness" still lingers in issue 3, which is something I rarely feel about a series after the second issue. Sometimes I lose that feeling in the first issue, even!

replies.text: Thank you very much for your feedback — I truly appreciate it.

comments.text: excellent book and an amazing series! I’d like to see the nsfw dial turned all the way to the max, but I appreciate that this could be a niche preference. Other than that, one thing I'd love to see are full colour prints as add-ons. Pin-ups were mentioned below - that'd be cool too.

replies.text: nk you! Turning up the NSFW level (especially in digital versions) is definitely being considered.
Good! This comment is here for absolutely no reason. Well, except for to say I agree. Which I really do.

comments.text: I love the humor that is weaved in to such a sexy storyline. The ghost on her shoulder is the best!
I changed something at the very top of the page 😈

Since the covers are all priced the same, it would make sense for that...unless that's been an option all along and I've missed it somewhere.

project.name: Fantasy Wolf Shifter Special Collector's Duet by Mila Young
project.description: Step into the hottest set of shifter romance books your shelf has ever beheld! Fated mates meets rejected mates in this shared world!

creator.name: Mila Young
creator.biography: Mila Young is a USA Today Bestselling Author of steamy, paranormal and fantasy romances where heroines fall for the monsters and alphas they should’ve run from. Twisted fairytales, fated mates, and dangerous love await.

titre: THE ADD ONS - SPECIAL EDITION FOILED BOOKS
texte: Two stunning editions in one incredible shared world!

Do you love: forbidden romance, fiercely protective book boyfriends, and an epic adventure that's just as thrilling as it is steamy? Then welcome to your newest series obsession from best selling author, Mila Young!
Her Forbidden Protector - Savage Sector

I’ll do whatever it takes to be free of my fated mate…

As a half-wolf outcast with powers, my soul mate rejected me, and despite throwing me off a cliff, by some miracle, I survived.

Only to find myself entangled with four dangerous Viking Wolves who awaken a passion within me that ignites fire through my veins and heat into my bones. They see my potential. See me despite my unique blend of darkness that I attract to us.

With me at their side, they want to conquer our broken wolf world and take reign.

But it's a deadly game, one I won't play without a few demands of my own—

Help me get revenge against my fated mate, no matter the cost.

Her Forbidden Protector is the complete collection of the Savage Sector books:
Lost Wolf
Broken Wolf
Fated Wolf
Cursed Wolf
Shadows & Wolves - Shadow Sector

I was taken by the deadliest Alpha.
Captivated by the most lethal Alpha in the land, the leader of the largest pack of wolves in the country, I found myself in a precarious situation.

He was my sworn enemy, feared by many, but my hatred for him was only overshadowed by my determination to resist being the prisoner he believed me to be. I vowed to break free from his grasp.

But then, something happened that shattered all my plans - he kissed me. And in that moment, I realized the awful truth.

He was my fated mate.

Shadows & Wolves is the complete collection of the Shadowlands Sector books:
Shadowlands Sector, One
Shadowlands Sector, Two
Shadowlands Sector, Three

This campaign is located in beautiful Australia. Please note that all prices are listed in AUD which appears as a higher conversion rate from USD. Tier pricing is available in both USD and AUD here in the story section.
THE PRINT STATS
Nightmare Island, the stand alone romance within the same shared world!
Available in the Shared World Collection, and a very limited few are also available in the add ons!
THE DESCRIPTION

I crash-land on Nightmare Island alone, and my only goal is to survive. The problem? This is the Exiled Sector where they dumped the most lethal Alphas alive, and Ghost finds me first. He’s masked, brutal, and obsessed in a way that should scare me… except my body reacts like it’s been waiting for him. Two wolf packs are at war, the island is hunting me, and Ghost decides I’m his to be protected, claimed, and kept, whether I’m ready or not.

Hi, I’m Mila Young, a USA Today Bestselling Author who writes dark, steamy stories with fierce heroines, broody monsters, and wild twists. By day, I work in marketing, but by night, I dive into fantasy worlds filled with magic, danger, and powerful women who don’t wait to be rescued—they take charge.

I’ve always been drawn to fairytales, but the darker the better. Give me a cursed forest, a masked villain, or a morally grey monster, and I’ll show you a heroine who will rise to meet him. My stories often begin with a “what if”—what if Red Riding Hood was the predator? What if the monster under the bed wanted to protect you, not kill you? That spark of curiosity is usually all it takes before the characters take over.

This series in particular was born out of my love for flipping tropes and creating heroines who rewrite the rules. I write for readers who crave emotional intensity, high heat, and a little bit of chaos in their romance. If that’s you, you’re in the right place.

I’ve been publishing for over a decade, and I’ve been producing special editions for years through my online store and physical retail partners. I stay closely involved from concept to finished book, from commissioning artwork and coordinating production to making sure these editions are shipped out to readers.
For more spicy romance from Mila Young, find her online on any of your favorite social media sites:

project.name: Alphonse Mucha Art Nouveau Masterpiece LE PATER book
project.description: Discover Alphonse Mucha's lost 1899 magical masterpiece, Le Pater. Deluxe hardcover book coming April 2026.

creator.name: Thomas Negovan
creator.biography: Thomas Negovan is the founder of Century Guild, a museum, publisher, and gallery specializing in Art Nouveau and Cabaret art from 1880-1920.

titre: Other Fine Art Books from Century Guild
texte: Art is a mirror. It reflects not only ourselves, but the world around us—allowing us to more clearly see our place within it. The greatest artworks reward deep examination. Our engagement with that art rewards us with a deeper insight into who we are, providing a roadmap to navigate the ever-changing landscapes of the world we inhabit.

In the late 19th century, electricity, bicycles, and countless other technologies we now take for granted were radical innovations. For the first time, telescopes and microscopes entered private homes, opening minds to realms beyond our immediate vision and expanding human perception in unprecedented ways. A revolutionary artistic movement emerged in this era, attempting to bridge the gap between the old world and the new with flowing vines entwining humanity with machinery; a reminder, at a pivotal moment in history, of our connection with Nature and each other, a poetic labor to build a bridge between the things we knew and the things we imagined possible: Art Nouveau.

Alphonse Mucha considered The Lord's Prayer the greatest poem ever written, and his metaphysical interpretation of the text was unlike anything the world had seen before. The artist, exhausted by commercial success, demanded that his most important work be produced in only 510 copies and then had the plates completely destroyed. This visionary artwork was Mucha’s love letter to humanity- and while it was often spoken of, it remained hidden for a century, with only esoteric book collectors and academics intimate with its contents.

In 2019, we released the first edition of Thomas Negovan's detailed analysis of the history which informed the work and reproduced Mucha's artworks nearly to full scale, a massive 16" tall tome. The next edition was revised and expanded with a section devoted to Le Pater's censorship by the church, published only as a 9" x 12" paperback.
The new edition is the expanded text, revised and presented in the original massive 12" x 16" hardcover scale.
For over a century, the mystical symbols embedded within Le Pater were dismissed as imagination. Fortunately, where art academia fails, occult academia rewards.

Over the course of twenty-five years, author Thomas Negovan traced the esoteric roots of Le Pater—decoding its hidden messages, spiritual symbolism, and forgotten history. His findings were revealed in a groundbreaking book, the most innovative study of Art Nouveau in decades.

The ultimate edition, this epic study of Le Pater features the entirety of Alphonse Mucha's 1899 series of artworks faithfully reproduced to scale, with an original body of research that reveals the mystical systems and encoded symbols behind every page.

Thanks to the Kickstarter community, in May of 2025 we successfully funded our 79th Kickstarter campaign, a deluxe edition of our sold-out fine art book exploring the lost Art Nouveau masterpiece of Alphonse Mucha.

The April 2026 book release is fast approaching, and we're marking the occasion with a final opportunity to get the book at a special discount price, and a meditation coin featuring Alphonse Mucha's 1899 flowering hammer sigil—a symbol of human will made manifest, illustrating our ability to shape our destiny through conscious action.

The third edition of Le Pater is unique and the most complete edition to date: a luxurious bibliophile volume featuring the massive scale of the first edition, and the expanded text and imagery of the second edition.

Mucha's Le Pater is a series of mystically encoded artworks that transform "The Lord's Prayer" into a spiritual exploration of the inner cosmos- and offer a doorway to explore the very nature of nature itself.

The first edition of Le Pater: Alphonse Mucha's Symbolist Masterpiece and the Lineage of Mysticism presented the artworks of Alphonse Mucha's Le Pater in a majestic 12" × 16" scale. The second edition, a 9" × 12" paperback, added over sixteen pages of expanded content.

"Thomas Negovan's amazing book is one of the greatest and most beautiful art and philosophy books to emerge in this strange era, a sacred offering filled with spiritual symbolism to uplift and heal the soul. Truly an inspiring masterpiece!"
                     — Alex Grey, Visionary painter and founder of the Chapel of Sacred Mirrors, known for his iconic work with the band Tool

"A glorious, whiplashed devotion to the divine feminine... Thomas Negovan masterfully conjures a portal through which we can explore the centuries-long arc of Symbolism and the transformative powers of Art."
                    — Gail Potocki, Symbolist painter

"There's a whole lot of talk about magick and the occult these days, but very few recognize just how much work and artistry go into development of a true sigil. This stunning volume demonstrates the sort of research, decoding, dedication, and precision required to embark on a mystical journey of this magnitude."
                    — Douglas Rushkoff, Media theorist and author best known for exploring technology, culture, and consciousness in books like Present Shock and Team Human

"Alphonse Mucha is an astonishing genius... Thomas Negovan’s beautiful book is probably my all-time favourite exploration of an artist who brought joy and beauty into the world and– simply put– played his part in making the world a better place."
                     — Roger Dean, Legendary artist and designer behind the iconic album covers for Yes and Asia, and the logos for Tetris and Virgin Records

"An exquisitely designed and well thought-out tribute to the Father of Art Nouveau. This book is truly a thing of beauty!"
                     — Thomas Blackshear, Renowned painter celebrated for his extensive work for the U.S. Postal Service and his evocative portrayals of spirituality

"Magic, masons, theosophy, heaven and hell, monsters and mirages, metaphysical diagrams, illustrated prayers, fantastical poems and of course marvellous paintings plus pithy commentaries. Dive deep and apprehend these mysteries, my friends, this book is essential stuff."
                    — Steve Kilbey, Psychedelic painter and poet, singer/songwriter for the band The Church

"Thomas' work is beyond description. Making Alphonse Mucha's profound interpretation of the Pater Noster so approachable, not just through careful words, but by the methodical, didactic manner in which he has organised the chapters and related art that inspired it... I will treasure this one!"
                    — Denis Poisson, also known as Foolish Fish, occult historian and author of Hidden Paths

"This is a well-made book with wonderful color reproduction and fantastic binding... It's very satisfying to see the artworks reproduced in high-resolution at this size. This is quite incredible!"
                    — Teoh Yi Chie, also known as Parka, artist, instructor, and creator of Parka Blogs
LE PATER: ALPHONSE MUCHA'S SYMBOLIST MASTERPIECE AND THE LINEAGE OF MYSTICISM [Author's Preferred Text • HARDCOVER EDITION]
LE PATER: ALPHONSE MUCHA'S SYMBOLIST MASTERPIECE AND THE LINEAGE OF MYSTICISM [Author's Preferred Text • CLAMSHELL EDITION]

An idea can change the world. A coin featuring Alphonse Mucha's 1899 flowering hammer sigil- a symbol of human will made manifest, the ability to shape our destiny through conscious action. Add on to any pledge tier for $22/each.

Featuring over 80 of the best antique posters we've had the good fortune to document! Each print measures 11 inches x 14 inches. Add on to any pledge tier for the Kickstarter-discounted price of $35/each!
Explore psychedelic starfish, omniscient owls, sinuous dragons, bizarre imaginary sea creatures, and other early fantasy masterpieces in brilliant detail.

In the late 19th century, Professor Anton Seder was one of the very first theorists of the Art Nouveau movement, yet his name is nearly lost to history. Animalia & Fantasia: The Magical Worlds & Fantastic Creatures of Professor Anton Seder features full-page, full-color presentations of Anton Seder's artwork as well as numerous close-up, high-resolution details that allow you to immerse yourself in this Art Nouveau pioneer's beautiful and strange visions of creatures both real and imagined.

This deluxe, limited edition hardcover book is over 200 pages and features full-page, full-color, high-resolution images captured directly from the original artworks in the Century Guild museum archive with historical text by author Thomas Negovan. Add on to any pledge level for $129/each!

A selection of artworks from the first year of the magazine Jugend - the namesake of the Jugendstil movement. Over two hundred rare and fantastic illustrations, as well as German Art Nouveau vignettes and framing elements, are included in this limited edition three volume paperback book set. These works are often mystical in nature, sometimes whimsical, other times eccentric– but always beautiful and fascinating.

To ensure maximum clarity and detail, all of the images in these books are captured directly from original books and magazines in the Century Guild collection using high-resolution photography and professional grade scans. Presented in a custom, full-color hard sided slipcase, each book measures 6" x 9" softcover, 80 pp full color throughout. Add on to any pledge level for $99/set!
Important Notes on Shipping & Tax

Thanks to our long track record of successfully fulfilled projects Kickstarter has granted Century Guild permission to run campaigns more frequently. With over 70 projects successfully fulfilled, we're excited for more opportunities to team up with our Backer Community and bring extraordinary art books to life! We want to make it as easy as possible to stay up to date on our projects, so we’ve implemented this Project Tracker as a simple way to check in on our campaign lineup and see the latest progress on every project.

All Century Guild Patreon members who are active at the close of this Kickstarter as well as at the time of delivery will find a special surprise included in their reward package: a member-exclusive Le Pater reward! $1 gets you full access to the online community perks, and for $5/month you can join us in the Century Guild Passport Club, where you'll receive a gorgeous foil-stamped "Think and Read" passport, and future mailings with special collectible postage-style stamps.
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 3,500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $1B raised between them.

available.name: LE PATER oversized Hardcover Edition
available.desc:
Le Pater: Alphonse Mucha's Symbolist Masterpiece and the Lineage of Mysticism; a massive 12" x 16" limited edition hardcover, printed to scale with Mucha’s original artworks!  Published in ultra-high resolution on fine cotton paper with advanced color correction, deluxe varnishes, and gilt highlighting, the book offers an unprecedented view of Alphonse Mucha’s Le Pater in a beautiful and dramatic presentation of ultra-clear images captured directly from the original 1899 artworks, and a thorough historical narrative outlining mystical symbolism by author Thomas Negovan. Retail $179

Shipping, sales tax, and VAT are not included and will be calculated in the pledge manager after the campaign. See shipping information for details.

project.name: Simply Ghibli
project.description: Studio Ghibli's iconic music arranged for violin and piano.

creator.name: Matthew Castle
creator.biography: Matthew Castle is a classical violinist and one half of classical duo, Castle & Vergobi.

titre: Why should you back this campaign?
texte: Castle & Vergobi is releasing their second album: a collection of violin and piano arrangements celebrating some of the most iconic Studio Ghibli scores ever written.

Matthew Castle and Luke Vergobi previously collaborated on Matthew’s album Classical Encore, which charted at number eight on the Billboard Classical charts in November 2024. That experience affirmed something they had already felt for years while making music together: this partnership deserved its own name, its own sound, and its own future. This new album marks the first official release under the duo name Castle & Vergobi.

This project features music from Totoro, Kiki’s Delivery Service, Spirited Away, Howl’s Moving Castle, Ponyo, Princess Mononoke, and The Boy and the Heron. Twelve sweeping tracks, each lovingly arranged for violin and piano, reimagining the melodies that defined entire childhoods and continue to move audiences around the world.

Every piece on this album was originally composed by the incomparable Joe Hisaishi, whose longtime collaboration with director Hayao Miyazaki shaped the emotional heartbeat of Studio Ghibli. His music is wonder, tenderness, adventure, melancholy, and hope all at once. This album is our way of honoring that legacy while offering something new and intimate through the voice of violin and piano.
Over the past year, we have been arranging, rehearsing, refining, and dreaming about this record. Now we are ready to bring it into a professional studio and turn it into something truly special.
Your support will help fund the studio space, sound engineers, production, mixing, and mastering needed to create an album that does justice to this extraordinary music.
Castle & Vergobi is the classical duo formed by Matthew Castle on violin and Luke Vergobi on piano.

Matthew is a professional violinist and recording artist whose album Classical Encore reached number eight on the Billboard Classical charts in November 2024. Luke has been playing piano since he was seven years old and studied music at the University of Washington. He brings a lifelong dedication to his craft and a deep sensitivity as a collaborator and arranger.

For the past year, this project has lived in our living room, our home studio, and our daily routines. These arrangements were not rushed. They were built slowly, with care, curiosity, and a deep love for the worlds these melodies come from. Each track has been shaped to highlight the warmth of the violin, the emotional range of the piano, and the cinematic quality that makes this music so enduring.
This is not just another album for us. It is a personal artistic statement and the beginning of Castle & Vergobi as a duo.
Backing this campaign means helping two independent classical musicians create an album with the resources it deserves.

Studio Ghibli’s music is deeply emotional and technically demanding. Capturing it properly requires a professional recording space, experienced engineers, and thoughtful production. Your support directly enables us to step into that space and work with the people who can help bring out every breath, bow stroke, and nuance in these performances.

This campaign is also about community. Many of us grew up with these films. Their music comforted us, inspired us, and stayed with us long after the credits rolled. By backing this project, you are helping transform that shared love into something tangible that can live in people’s homes, headphones, and hearts.
You are not just pre-ordering an album. You are helping create it.
Backers of this campaign will receive access to a range of rewards designed to bring you closer to the music and the process behind it.
Supporters will be able to receive digital downloads of the full album, along with digital sheet music arranged by Castle & Vergobi for select tracks.
Physical rewards will include signed CDs and vinyl records, created as keepsakes meant to be cherished, displayed, and played for years to come.

We are also offering a special opportunity for backers to have their name printed in the CD and vinyl liner notes. This album would not exist without the people who help bring it to life, and we want to honor that by permanently including our supporters in the physical history of the project.
Every reward tier helps move this album from dream to reality, and we are deeply grateful for every person who chooses to be part of this journey.
Thank you for believing in this music and in us.

A high quality album costs tens of thousands of dollars to produce. Despite this, we've set our Kickstarter goal at a modest $10,000, far less than the actual cost. The stretch goals will help us cover the true cost of producing this album at a first class level. 


⭐️ $15,000.00 - One additional song (track total 11)
⭐️ $20,000.00 - Two additional songs (track total 12)
⭐️ $25,000.00 - Extra musicians on one song
⭐️ $30,000.00 - Extra musicians on two songs
⭐️ $35,000.00 - Professional mastering
⭐️ $40,000.00 - Colorful Vinyl (for tiers with a Vinyl reward)
⭐️ $45,000.00 - Ghibli character sticker pack illustrated by Paul Castle (for tiers with physical rewards)
⭐️ $50,000.00 - Exclusive vinyl and CD with extra Ghibli character illustrations by Paul Castle (for tiers with a Vinyl or CD reward)
⭐️ $60,000.00 - Extra Classical Encore CD (Billboard #8 Classical Album 2025) (for tiers with a Vinyl or CD reward)
🔒 $90,000.00 - One song with string orchestra (track total 13)
🔒 $110,000.00 - Two songs with string orchestra (track total 14)
🔒 $130,000.00 - Three songs with string orchestra (track total 15)
🔒 $150,000.00 - Four songs with string orchestra (track total 16)

comments.text: Very happy to support Luke and Matthew's music journey. The music is absolutely beautiful and emotional for me. I just read that Paul will have some of his beautiful artwork attached to this project. What a treat! I feel honored to help in a small way with this Kickstarter. Love you guys so much. ❤️
Hint hint, nudge nudge... no spoilers, please, but my favorite Ghibli film track is "Ashitaka to San." I know every piece on the album is going to be fantastic!

replies.text: We both love that song as well!

comments.text: Matthew and Paul’s story came up on my YouTube feed and I was instantly captivated by their love story, their talents, their challenges, their humor, their struggles, and their JOY! I am happy to fund this deserving and beautiful project! And although my kids are now adults, I will buy Paul’s books for my future grandchildren! Good luck to Matthew, Paul, Luke, and Mr Maple! Thanks for sharing your life and talents with the world!🩷

project.name: modobloom—Pill Organizer Reimagined
project.description: A modular magnetic pill & supplement box | Simple, Flexible, Made for daily wellness

creator.name: modobloom
creator.biography: We’re a design team design with a simple mission: make health tools that feel warm, not clinical.

node.name: BackerLead: Keep up with leading idea

texte:
Not an app.
Not a clinical box.
A physical organizer designed for vitamins, supplements, and meds.
Minimal, calming, and made to belong in your life.
Tritan™ is a trademark of Eastman Chemical Company, registered in the U.S. and other countries.

Out of sight = out of mind.
modobloom stays where you’ll see it—your counter, desk, or nightstand.
It's more than just a container;
it becomes a part of your daily routine, effortlessly cultivating
sustainable healthy habits.

Simply refill once and enjoy effortless, clutter-free organization that lasts all week.
The internal compartments are thoughtfully sized to accommodate your real supplement routines,
simplifying your daily health routine.

Keep it organized at your home base, then simply grab and go.
It travels effortlessly in your bag for work, long journeys, or any activity like a tennis game or going to the gym.
modobloom travels with you, always.

The refined structural design offers an exceptionally smooth user experience.
Each colorful container corresponds to a day,
linking each module to your Monday-through-Sunday routine.

For home: Leave it where you live—kitchen, nightstand, vanity.
For travel: Slim module slips into your carry-on. TSA-friendly, stress-free.
For gym: Pack recovery and performance in one grab-and-go.

We use Tritan™ from Eastman USA — a high-quality, BPA-free material known for its clarity, durability, and safety. 
• Made with FDA-compliant Tritan™ material
• BPA-free & food-contact safe
• Tested to meet FDA food safety standards

Before launch, we shared modobloom with 10–20 early users.
Feedback has been very positive, highlighting the clean design and intuitive magnetic modular system, which makes daily routines feel simpler and more organized.
Several users said it's the first pill organizer they'd happily use long-term and recommend to family and friends.
The image above shows the Greeting Card product. It includes one large card, two small cards, and seven paper flowers inside.
The image above shows the Sticker product. It includes 15 stickers inside. Please refer to the image above for detailed designs.

Every modobloom is a gift from the heart.
Our ‘Gift Pick’ edition includes custom cards and stickers, so your family and friends can experience not only a wonderful surprise but also the warmth of your personal touch.

Every frustration was solved.
Features like the matte privacy finish, color-coded lids, and precision-tuned magnets ensure a generous, smooth, one-handed experience, always keeping your needs in view.

•  Dozens of prototypes tested for balance, size, and flow
•  Quiet hinges refined to open with ease and close without fuss
•  Soft-touch finishes chosen to feel gentle in your hands and calm in your space
•  Colors curated to blend into homes, not stand out like medical gear
•  Daily-life testing — from counters to gym bags to flights, ensuring it fits seamlessly

Honored with the 2025 Red Dot Award,
the modobloom organizer, polished through a year of detailing, is ready for the market.
We're a design team with a simple mission: make health tools that feel warm, not clinical.

For Solin, our founder, this began with something deeply personal. In his mid-20s, he faced a health scare that forced him to take medication on time, every day. The pill organizers he found were sterile and joyless — they didn’t inspire trust or consistency.
That experience changed everything. Solin realized the real problem wasn’t people lacking discipline — it was the design of the tools themselves.

So we began reimagining. We asked:
What if health products were calming to use?
What if they looked like part of your home, not something to hide away?
What if they carried goodness in every detail?
modobloom is our answer — a product built to make wellness feel natural, human, and beautiful.
And this is bigger than one product. It's about leaving a healthier legacy — for today and for the future.

This is why we do what we do. And it's why we want you to be part of this mission. By joining us now, you're not just backing a product. You're helping shape a future where wellness is simple, consistent, and dignified for everyone.

At modobloom, we craft every product with care and lasting quality. We offer a 1-year warranty, covering any issues caused by manufacturing errors or product defects. Our goal is to ensure a reliable, worry-free experience — your comfort and trust are our constant commitment.

At modobloom, every product is crafted with care and precision. Our team combines advanced technology with thoughtful design to create products that enhance daily comfort and well-being. Quality and sustainability guide everything we do.
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 3,500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $1B raised between them.

project.name: Ricardo Delgado's Vampyre - A Horror Folktale
project.description: Exquisite hardcover illustrated prose novel set in the world of Delgado's Dracula of Transylvania, plus exclusive Kickstarter extras!

creator.name: Clover Press
creator.biography: Clover Press is an eclectic, boutique publisher. Clover looks to celebrate authors and works in a non-mainstream way. We publish books we love!

texte: Set in the same world as Delgado's DRACULA OF TRANSYLVANIA, VAMPYRE: A HORROR FOLKTALE is a vampiric supernatural prose tale set in 1940s Costa Rica. It's part folktale, part autobiographic and is told in both English and Spanish.
"This is a very personal story for me, and it's dedicated to my parents." - Ricardo Delgado.

Inspired by the classic 1980s illustrated novella CYCLE OF THE WEREWOLF by Stephen King and Bernie Wrightson, this bilingual story is both a gruesome tale of the occult and a touching depiction of mid-century Costa Rican life. A beautiful hardcover, it includes over 200 pages crammed with historical maps, creature designs and photos of actual locations from the story both then and now. It's also a historical perspective of Delgado's parents' lives in the small town in Costa Rica where they grew up, but with the fictional (or is it?) horror element of a vampire added in.

"From the creator of DRACULA OF TRANSYLVANIA comes a vampiric horror folk tale guaranteed to chill the bones this spooky season! Lavishly illustrated by Ricardo Delgado, writer and concept artist, VAMPYRE - A HORROR FOLKTALE is a tour-de-force of horror writing and artistry. Annotated concept art accompanies this macabre historical story of a ferocious Nosferatu that terrifies a small town. Be sure to order your copy today! 
       "Colorful characters provide the backdrop for the unspeakable terror that is woven throughout this creepy tale. Come aboard if you dare." 
 
—Floyd Norman, Disney Animation Legend
Sleeping Beauty, Jungle Book, Mary Poppins, 101 Dalmatians, Toy Story 2, Monsters, Inc.

"VAMPYRE - A HORROR FOLKTALE is a thrilling journey through the supernatural and the macabre. Opulently written and illustrated by the creator of DRACULA OF TRANSYLVANIA, and chock full of concept art from Ricardo Delgado, one of Hollywood's most prominent creature designers.

"Encrimsoned words and images transport us into an unforgettable vampire realm. Delgado's undead folklore leaves marks deeper than any fangs." 

—Gary Rhodes, Dracula scholar and author
Tod Browning’s Dracula

options.name: The Art of Dracula of Transylvania
options.desc:
Horrifically Beautiful Illustrations from the World of Ricardo Delgado's Dracula of Transylvania!

He also provides detailed annotations of his work, discusses his process, and shares thoughts on his creations. The book also features a foreword from horror writer/director Donald F. Glut and an introduction by noted film historian Gary D. Rhodes.
LIMITED QUANTITY OFFERED AT SPECIAL PRICE.

project.name: NeoSander: Mini Electric Reciprocating Detail Sander
project.description: Designed for Real Detail Work｜13,000 SPM Linear Motion｜Tight, Controlled Precision｜Adjustable Stroke Length｜Sand & Saw in One｜Cordless

creator.name: HOZO Design. Co.
creator.biography:
At HOZO, we strive to empower every evolved maker with our cutting-edge tools and unparalleled expertise. From advanced measuring instruments to ultrasonic cutters and beyond, our innovative solutions are designed to elevate your craft.

With a presence in over 65 countries and regions, and a community of more than 100,000 active users worldwide, HOZO is dedicated to supporting your journey of creation and precision.

node.name: BackerLead: Keep up with leading idea

titre: 🌍's 1st Reciprocating Linear Motor for Detail Sanding
8️⃣ Head Shapes for Every Tight Spot
🪚 Also the Smallest Electric Reciprocating Saw
🎯 How Does It Make Every Pass Spot-On?
texte: They work the same way: a spinning motor turns gears, gears move rods, and rods push the sanding head back and forth. We asked ourselves a simple question: Do we really need all of this just to move a sanding head?
That’s when we went back to first principles. What do you actually need for perfect, controlled sanding? Direct, precise, linear motion. Nothing more.
This vertically mounted motor sends power straight to the sanding head — no gears, no rods, just fast, snappy strokes.
Detail sanding is a balancing act—too fast, and you ruin it; too slow, and you waste hours. And isn’t it ironic? Most “detail sanders” fail right where the work gets tricky.
NeoSander hits the tight spot—a real detail sander that actually gets the details done.
Fast is great—but only if you can control it. Too much speed, like with rotary tools, can cause kickback, dig in, and mess things up. The right sanding motion is what lets you make the most of speed.
NeoSander’s straight-line motion covers more area efficiently, sanding fast while keeping your workpiece free from gouges—ideal for detailed work.
Nothing speaks louder than seeing it in action:

But if the sanding head can’t reach the tight spot you want, all that high-speed motion means nothing.

That’s why NeoSander comes with 8 head shapes — each built for a different kind of tricky detail.
The right head gets you there, but the right grit makes it shine. NeoSander comes with 8 grits of sandpapers—taking you from rough shaping to mirror-smooth finishing.

For better conformity on every surface, we created the Master Sandpaper Kit. Each grit includes 3 standard sandpapers and 1 foam-layered sandpaper, delivering a smoother finish and better contact on curves and uneven surfaces.

Foam-Layered Sandpaper maintains consistent contact across uneven surfaces, absorbs excess pressure, and delivers controlled material removal—avoiding over-sanding on high spots while evenly sanding the entire surface.
When you’ve only got one set of sanding heads, limits everywhere — and changing grits can sometimes feel like a… Peel-and-Stick Marathon.

And one more thing: pick up your tool after some time… wait, what grit was this again? For detail-obsessed makers, losing track like that also disrupts your flow—exactly why a complete, organized system is a must.
With this color-coded combo, your grits always stay sorted and ready to swap. From coarse to fine, just grab the head you need, snap it on, and keep sanding.
The same back-and-forth motion that sands with ease also drives a saw blade effortlessly, letting you flow seamlessly from sanding delicate details to cutting small pieces.
The wave-shaped double-tooth pattern works perfectly with the reciprocating linear motion—one row cuts while the other clears debris—delivering faster, smoother cuts and reducing binding.
Have you noticed? NeoSander moves so fast, with strokes so tiny you can barely see — and yet every pass is spot-on precise.
At a fixed 13,000 SPM, NeoSander lets you fine-tune the stroke length (0.6–1.8 mm) to control sanding speed, delivering a precise linear speed of 260–780 mm/s.
*Linear speed formula: Speed (mm/s) = Stroke × 2 × SPM ÷ 60
These tight, controlled strokes deliver up to 76% more precision and reduce overreach compared to other reciprocating sanders.
The wobblier the strokes, the more the sanding head drifts—right into places you don’t want it to go.

NeoSander is a different story: its reciprocating linear motor delivers the most direct, controlled strokes no other sander can match. No gears, no rods, no wandering sanding heads—precision guaranteed.
Most sanders aren’t built for pressure—they stall right away when pushed, low speed makes it worse.

While most traditional sanders jam—gears lock, rods bind—when you push too hard, NeoSander just keeps going. Its adjustable-stroke linear motor ensures smooth, continuous motion no matter the challenge.
And the vibration doesn’t stop at your grip—it travels into the workpiece, buzzing your other hand. Before long, your hands go numb and precision slips away.
To solve this, NeoSander uses a counterweight that moves opposite the sanding head, canceling out most vibration and keeping your grip steady, even at full speed.
No bulky housings blocking your view, no cords pulling you off balance—just a compact tool that fits right in your palm and moves with your hand wherever the detail leads.
Want to level up your sanding even further? Start with a cleaner cut—because great sanding always begins before you even start sanding.
NeoBlade, a Wireless Ultrasonic Cutter, delivers precise, smooth cuts with a blade vibrating at 40,000 times per second—leaving less work for NeoSander and smoother results overall.

NeoSander masters the details. NeoBlock, on the other hand, handles the bigger surfaces. 

When you crave the classic control of a sanding block, NeoBlock delivers—with quick-swap modular design and secure belt tension. Together, they cover every sanding need—from fine details to broad strokes.
After the success of NeoBlade, we kept asking ourselves: could the same mechanism work for detail sanding? We tried, we tested… and quickly realized ultrasonic vibration wasn’t the answer.
That challenge sparked a bigger question: how do we build a sanding tool that makers actually need — one that can tackle even the trickiest, tiniest details with ease?
Zone 1: China, Japan, Singapore, Thailand, Taiwan, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Malaysia

Zone 2: Canada, Brazil, Mexico, Chile, Colombia, Turkey, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, Slovenia, Austria, Ireland, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Czechia, Germany, Spain (Balears Province, Las Palmas, Melilla, Santa Cruz De Tenerife not included), France, Lativia, Slovakia, Bulgaria, Switzerland, Croatia, Hungary, Qatar, Kuwait, New Zealand, Italy, Israel, South Africa, Cyprus, United Kingdom, Australia, United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, Lithuania, Greece, United States of America, Estonia, Sweden, Portugal, Romania, Poland, South Korea, Philippines
Zone 3: Rest of the World

Taxes and VAT are included in your shipping cost for all US and EU countries (IOSS covers that). If you are still charged any duties when receiving the products in the EU (covered by IOSS)/US, please contact us for reimbursement with the receipt.

For other international shipping countries, the item's price does NOT include additional duties and taxes that may apply as per local laws for importation. If taxes and/or duties apply, your local courier will contact you to accommodate your local laws. We appreciate your kind understanding. Sometimes goods less than a specific value or in certain categories do not incur taxes. The rules are different in every country.
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 3,500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $1B raised between them.

comments.text: I pledged this on day 1. I loved the NeoBlade, so I am extremely excited to see what the NeoSander can do :-)

replies.text: Hi Dennis, thanks so much for backing us on day one—and we’re really happy to hear you’ve been enjoying NeoBlade!

comments.text: I would really like the option of adding a complete set of colored heads and labeled holders. If you want to have all strengths and all sizes for both foam backed and regular sand pads then another set is needed.

replies.text: Ah, I did not realize that there was only one size for the foam-backed kit. So, would it be possible to add a set of multi-colored sanding heads in just that one size, one for every grid strength?

While there’s only one size for the foam-layered sandpaper, it actually works with five different sanding head shapes. For this campaign, we intentionally kept the options simple and easy to understand, rather than introducing too many variations that could become confusing. That’s also why we didn’t further split options between standard sandpaper and foam-layered sandpaper at this stage.

I saw what you mean by the foam sandpaper fitting 5 sizes, but it seems that it is mostly intended to fit the "large flat" shape. I think it would be super useful to offer a module with 8 large flat sanding heads in the 8 different grid strength colors. I would add that to my order without hesitation.

comments.text: I am looking forward to this. Since you have that sanding heads and the saw heads for cutting too, one idea I have is why not have also a metal file head too it would work the same way since neo sander moves up and down. Maybe Sam size as a small filing set or jewelers file size.

replies.text: Hi Joseph, the main challenge is weight. For a true reciprocating system, the mass of the head has to be very tightly controlled, otherwise it can significantly affect performance and smoothness. We’ve actually explored similar concepts, but so far haven’t found a solution that meets our standards.

comments.text: Boy, how many 3D prints I wished I had this while working on them!

replies.text: Hi Fredrick, totally get that. It really makes finishing 3D prints so much easier. Can’t wait for you to try it on your next print!
I've been relying on my resin printers more than FDM as of late and NeoBlade has served me far too well on that.

comments.text: Tricky would be sanding brittle 3d printing resin, it's very hard to sand, but other power tools (even smaller ones) can break off pieces or do "too much" work in terms of sanding or cutting.

replies.text: Hi Jemima, you’re totally right—brittle resin is tricky to sand, and most power tools just remove too much material or risk chipping those delicate areas.
While you are correct that the NeoSander will be huge for this, also try out ABS-like resin. It is more flexible so it shatters much less easily. This is ESPECIALLY good for miniature figurines :-)

That's actually primarily what I use, the ABS-like resin from Siraya, but unless I mix it with other, pricier resins for extra flexibility, the small, sharp parts with fine details will always be susceptible to damage from even small drops and hits when working with it.

comments.text: The trickiest sanding challenge I've faced is the awkward, tight angles in 3D prints - particularly connector holes, especially when a support interfact doesn't want to disconnect. Ones where you could *maybe* get a sanding stick into, but will get almost nowhere because the piece you need to sand is allllllll the way back into the corner.

replies.text: Hi Alexandra, those tight corners and connector holes can be really frustrating to get into with traditional tools.

comments.text: What is the abrasive used in the sandpaper? Aluminium oxide, silicone carbide, etc.. ?

replies.text: Hi Richard, great question! We use silicon carbide abrasives across all our sandpapers.
Great answer!!
Yes—silicon carbide is much harder than aluminum (around Mohs 9), so from an abrasive standpoint it can definitely handle removing small CNC tabs on aluminum parts.

comments.text: I really can not wait for this, I have already brought 2 ppl over through the affilated program hoping to get even more of my friends to join. Is the pencil promotion still ongoing?

replies.text: Hi Tiberia, thank you so much—we really appreciate the support and for spreading the word!

comments.text: Smaller details and recessed niches can be tricky to sand, hopefully the adjustable reciprocating action and multiple heads help make working with these easier.

replies.text: Hi Steven, totally—that’s exactly what we were aiming for. Small details and recessed areas can be a pain, and that’s where the reciprocating motion and multiple heads really help. Can’t wait to see what you end up using it on!

comments.text: Do you plan on doing any stretch goals?

replies.text: Hi Christop, at this point, it’s a bit late for us to introduce stretch goals. That said, we do have a big surprise planned that we’ll be sharing with all backers as the project gets close to ending—or shortly after it wraps up. So stay tuned for the project updates 😉
Isn't it more than a month to go? there is still so much steam to get by providing enticement for ppl to join especially streech goals. ^^

comments.text: This little device looks like what I’ve been looking for. I love almost everything about it.

replies.text: Hi Sheldon, thanks for the kind words—we’re really glad NeoSander feels like what you’ve been looking for.

comments.text: Does the sandingpro come with a head for the foam sandpaper?

replies.text: Hi Michelle, the Sanding Pro combo includes one set of multicolor sanding heads. If you’re looking to get more sanding heads, there’s no need to add another NeoSander pledge. You can simply select the Basic Sanding Head Collection in the add-on section, which is the easiest way to expand your setup.

comments.text: Trickiest sanding challenges would have to be every D&D miniature I have printed for friends with my FDM printers.  The Feature I love ethe most is the use of a linear drive motor.

I backed the all-in combo and had a question about the multi-color sanding heads. Is there a case that they fit into for storage? Because having 8 free-standing blocks with no way to effectively store them is a bit cumbersome for organizational purposes.

replies.text: I am interested in a case like this too. I am too clumsy to have it just sitting there open when not in use. Also just keeping it in the packaging is tacky
Since you guys have all the dimensions. Can you provide a free stl of a storage box that we can print ourselves?

@Christina, we actually encourage users to do their own creations and modifications around NeoSander, and a 3D-printed storage solution is a great idea. I’ll definitely pass your suggestion about providing a free STL file to our team for consideration.

comments.text: As a bit of feedback, it would be useful to have corded operation as an option. Far too many times I've picked up a tool to use it, only to find out the battery was dead, because it hadn't been sitting on its charger.

replies.text: Their tools (including this new one) work when plugged in and battery is dead
Great, that's good to know. The front page made it sound like it charged from a dock only. Thanks for the reply.

Hi Maeyanie, thanks for the feedback—totally hear you on that. Just to clarify: NeoSander does support plug-in operation. You can use it while it’s plugged in and charging—no need to wait for it to charge or rely on a dock only.

comments.text: Trickiest : Getting a precise fit of laser cut components in my models.

Hello there, I just pledged the all in combo. Looks all great for the 3D stuff I made with Bambu. The pledge includes the NeoBlade. Will that arrive sooner, because it’s already on the market and I’m very inpatient 🥹? Great work ladies and guys!

replies.text: Hi Peter, thanks so much for backing the All-in Combo—and we’re excited to hear you’ll be using it on your 3D prints!
Oké, thanks… an other question. Will there be an add on for de calliper and/or ruler?

Do you mean NeoRuler? If so, we’re considering making it available as an add-on in the shipping survey we’ll send out after the campaign wraps up (via PledgeBox). You’ll be able to add it to your pledge there when you fill in your shipping info.

comments.text: I backed this project. Awesome looking tool for stuborn 3d print lines. Will get heavy use in my modelling as I build studio scale models.

replies.text: Hi Des Chin, thanks so much for backing the project! And just to clarify, we’re HOZO. Yes—once the campaign wraps up, all accessories will be available for purchase on the HOZO website, as well as other official sales channels. This Kickstarter campaign simply offers the best pricing ever as a backer benefit.
Awesome !!! looking forward to it.

comments.text: Can I cut my own sandpaper replacements or am I stuck only buying refills from your company?

replies.text: Hi Sachi, we generally don’t recommend cutting your own sandpaper, mainly because the adhesive can be tricky—if it’s too strong, it may leave residue on the sanding head, which can affect how flat the next piece sits. Our sandpaper adhesive has been carefully tuned to strike the right balance: a secure hold with clean removal.

comments.text: With this tool about to be available: Do you have plans for a desktop dedusting plant with filters to minimize the resin dust pollution and such while working with NeoSander?

replies.text: Hi Oli, as you can probably tell from the GIFs, NeoSander’s reciprocating motion produces far less airborne dust compared to traditional rotary sanding. That said, we definitely don’t rule out exploring tools in other areas down the line. I’ll be sure to pass your idea along to our team for future consideration.

comments.text: Can you make a knife blade kit for it, or perhaps  a cutting edge will not work. You tell me.

replies.text: Hi Russ, thanks for taking the time to share such detailed thoughts — we really appreciate it.

comments.text: Hello. I backed your project. A few impressions about the package:

replies.text: Hi there, thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts — we really appreciate the honest feedback. I’ll make sure your suggestions are passed along to our R&D team for reference.

comments.text: Have they considered a sealing system to prevent sanding dust from entering the NeoSande, in order to extend its lifespan?

replies.text: Hi Francisco, if you look closely, there is a silicone cover at the front, which helps block dust from entering the mechanism while still allowing smooth reciprocating motion.

comments.text: Hi Hozo,

replies.text: Hi Paul, thanks for your support!

comments.text: Hi Hozo,

replies.text: Hi Hunter, thanks for the thoughtful questions — we’re really glad NeoSander looks like a good fit for your workflow!

project.name: Alpha Clash: Rising Empires by Mark Waid & AJ Light (#1-4)
project.description: An Explosive Sci-Fi Action Thriller Comic Series set in the Alpha Clash universe.

creator.name: Ridge Kiley (Alpha Clash)
creator.biography: CEO of Rising Empire Studios and the creator of Alpha Clash.

texte: From legendary writer Mark Waid (Kingdom Come, Daredevil) and Alpha Clash co-creator AJ Light comes a bold new sci-fi action thriller series set in the expanding Alpha Clash universe.
Rising Empires is a grounded, character-driven story about what happens after the world has already changed — and the people left behind to deal with it.

When the world changed, not everyone survived it.
Now, Alphas are vanishing.
What’s happening may be more dangerous than the powers themselves.

Rising Empires takes place five years after the events of The Awakening. As Alphas — individuals awakened with extraordinary powers — begin disappearing across the globe, and a new generation of heroes and villains is drawn into a conflict that threatens to reshape the future.

Dr. Sommers is a reluctant genius awakened with terrifying clarity. As he uncovers a global pattern of disappearing Alphas, his investigation pulls him into conflict with the enigmatic Nix, the charismatic but dangerous Everett Monk, and a new generation of Alphas including Razorback, Brick, and Huff.

The first four issues in this campaign are designed as a clean entry point into the Alpha Clash universe. No previous books are required, and longtime fans will still discover deeper connections woven throughout the story.

These issues are illustrated by some of the most talented artists working in comics today — creators whose work has appeared across Marvel, DC, BOOM! Studios, Image, Dark Horse, and other major publishers. These artists bring the world of Rising Empires to life with dynamic, collectible-quality variants crafted specifically for this series.

Alpha Clash is a fully connected, creator-owned universe spanning comics, a competitive trading card game, novels, a board game, TCG PVE expansion, and ongoing narrative storytelling. Rising Empires builds on the foundation established in The Awakening, Torque Therapy, and Cosmic Conquest, while standing entirely on its own for new readers.
When a mysterious event known as The Awakening reshapes the world, ordinary people across the globe suddenly manifest extraordinary abilities — and an overwhelming instinct to clash.

From that moment, Alpha Clash has followed the ripple effects of this event across time, generations, and worlds. Each story explores a different corner of a shared universe — from street-level conflicts to cosmic threats — all connected by characters whose choices shape what the future becomes.

Special 'Author's Margin Edition' features thoughts and notes from the authors.


Rising Empires sits at a critical point in that timeline. It’s the moment when the dust has settled, the world has adapted… and something new begins to move in the shadows.

You don’t need to know everything that came before to understand this story. But for readers who choose to go deeper, Alpha Clash is a universe built to reward curiosity — one that continues to grow across comics, games, and beyond.
Hardcover Coffee Table books contain comics, sketches, scripts, and more.

Mark Waid — Co-Writer / Editor
A multiple New York Times-bestselling author and Eisner Award winner whose work has appeared in countless languages across the globe. Over the course of his four decades in the comic book industry, Waid has written and edited over 2,000 comic titles and received every major award.

He has developed characters and written stories for both DC and MARVEL COMICS – Batman, Superman, Spider-Man, The Avengers, X-Men, Archie, Star Wars, The Incredibles, Fantastic Four, Wonder Woman, Daredevil, Captain America – and almost every other franchise currently enjoying success across all media platforms.

KINGDOM COME, which Waid co-created for DC Comics, has become one of the best-selling graphic novels in history. Many of the storylines and characters he wrote and created in his eight-year run on THE FLASH comic books were featured on the hit television series.

AJ Light — Co-Writer / Creator
A writer and storyteller whose work has helped shape the foundation of the Alpha Clash universe from its earliest days as a Co-founder of Rising Empire Studios. As author of The Awakening novel, Torque Therapy comic, and Cosmic Conquest comic series, Light has been instrumental in defining the tone, characters, and narrative direction of the IP. His writing blends clear, grounded characterization with large-scale world building, creating stories that resonate with fans.

Beyond the comics, Light has worked to develop narrative cohesion across the trading card game, novels, and connected media, ensuring the universe grows with consistency and intention. His work continues to set the stage for future expansions of the Alpha Clash story, both on the page and across its broader cross-media platform.

Ridge & Garett Kiley — Producers
Co-founders of Rising Empire Studios and producers behind the expanding Alpha Clash universe. Since launching the company, the brothers have helped lead its growth across multiple mediums — including comics, the competitive Alpha Clash Trading Card Game, novels, board games, and connected narrative projects. They oversee much of the creative, production, and publishing efforts that bring the universe to life, working closely with writers, artists, and designers to ensure every new release aligns with the larger vision for the IP.

Through their direction, Rising Empire Studios has established itself as a dedicated independent publisher focused on building a cohesive, character-driven world that spans both print and interactive storytelling. Their hands-on approach and long-term planning continue to guide the evolution of Alpha Clash and its expanding slate of creative initiatives.

Josh Horton — Marketing 
A multi-platform influencer and marketing strategist whose digital footprint spans millions of followers across YouTube, Instagram and TikTok. This co-owner of Rising Empire Studios has a background in social media campaigns, brand partnerships and content creation for major entertainment clients, Josh brings powerful promotional reach and audience engagement to the Rising Empires campaign. His involvement means your pledge doesn’t just support a comic book — it gains visibility through a populous, active community already tuned into comics and pop-culture.
Every backer receives digital access, and every physical tier includes unlocked stretch goals revealed throughout the campaign.
As funding grows, unlocked stretch goals are added to eligible pledges at no additional cost.
Enhance your pledge with optional add-ons, including exclusive items and extras available only during this campaign.

Independent comics exist because readers choose to believe in them. Your pledge directly empowers our writers, artists, and production team to tell this story the right way — and to keep Alpha Clash creator-owned and community-supported.

Many of the books, covers, and collectibles in this campaign are exclusive to this moment and will never be printed again. Backing now isn’t just a purchase — it’s becoming part of the journey and helping ensure these stories continue to exist because readers like you chose to support them.

All rewards will be shipped worldwide from Rising Empire Studios’ U.S. facility.
Estimated fulfillment: August/September 2026.

Actual shipping costs are calculated in a post-campaign pledge manager based on region and weight. Estimated shipping costs are subject to change. Import duties, taxes, and fees are not included in estimates and are the buyer's responsibility.
Every pledge helps build a universe where comics, games, and stories collide into something truly original. Thank you for being part of Rising Empires and the future of Alpha Clash.

comments.text: I got interested at first because of Mark Waid, when I came to the kickstart page and reading more about the project my interest peaked more and I committed to backing the project.

I don't know about anyone else, but I was not done exploring the storyline of our current time. This will answer the question of how the world would looks, when super beings didn't create a new Ragnarok. That is why I am backing this campaign - I need to know 😊

I just thought the art looked great, and your ads funny too, you could probably get people to break while being questioned, by tearing comic books in half till they spill there guts! LOL, I can't wait to get to read this! Thanks for all your hard work!
I’m excited for this set because of the expanded universe of characters and storyline!

I backed this kickstarter because Mark Waid is one of the most important voices in the industry, and I actually love his passions, Superman and the Legion most notably. Anyone who loves Krypto and Kandor as much as Mark does is my kind of guy.
Mark Waid is one of my favorite comic writers, and quite possibly the best writer of superheroes today. Getting to read him do his thing in a new world or setting is always a treat.
I would have skipped if not for Mark Wiad

replies.text: Fingers went faster then brain, Mark Waid

comments.text: Can not wait to see what comes from the imagination of this creative team.  Looking forward to a great reading experience.
Excited to explore this universe!

I am so excited for this story!  I have read Mark Waid's work over the years and heard him speak at Comicon!  His is energy and storytelling is going to be amazing in growing the Alpha Clash universe!!
I'm super excited to support and read anything by Mark Waid! The late great Brian Augustyn pointed me to Waid's work and I've never been disappointed! 🙌
Excited for the new direction for the AC story!
I backed this because JLA Tower of Bable and Kingdom Come are 2 of the best comics I have read and I want to read more.
Really enjoy Mark Waids work.  Looking forward to seeing where he goes in this series
I've been really looking forward to see what has happened after the novel. I'm also really excited for that portal coin.
Ya had me at shiny cardboard. Looking forward to where this story leads tho🔥
This new era of comics is going to be incredible! I can't wait to learn how far the world has come since new York!

I am counting the days to read this new story and to see the new decks so I can teach my friends how to play. Greetings to everyone from Costa Rica! I hope the game arrives here this year with the new set.
Can’t wait to see and read this new Alpha Clash story. New Heroes and Villains. After reading the novel. Seeing what happens 5 years later will be very interesting and exciting.

Can't wait to get my hands on those cards! I loved the comics that have been released already but I've been craving more of the current timeline story so I'm really excited to see what comes next in these issues!
Looking forward to reading this amazing collab with Mark Waid & AJ Light! Excited for this next chapter in the Alpha Clash Universe! 🔥
Can't wait to read the series! Love seeing the AC universe continue to expand 💜
Looking forward to seeing what the next chapter in Alpha Clash looks like.
I will admit to being dismayed that for a CCG Centrist property, in order to get built-In playable CCG Cards, you must pledge no less than $99.

replies.text: I think the TCG product being a fun add-on at higher tiers is fine. The company doesn't solely revolve around the TCG but does include products as bonuses for additional support which is pretty standard in the space. With the cards not being mechnically unique or high rarity staples there is no need for the TCG player base to fret over alt-art promos

comments.text: Is the $35 reader edition included in the preview deck stretch goal?  Also is that a playable alpha clash deck?  Because that would be sick

replies.text: The Reader Edition does get the Preview Deck stretch goal! It's two 30-card Alpha Clash 'Preview Decks'. A la a demo deck game experience.
